translation.en: [Asha] My name is Asha Maurya.
translation.zh: 我叫艾莎·莫亚

translation.en: And I have a joyous appetite for life.
translation.zh: 我胃口很大 很能吃

translation.en: I'm patient.
translation.zh: 我做事有耐心

translation.en: Resourceful.
translation.zh: 心灵手巧

translation.en: And I’m a natural in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 我是天生的厨艺高手

translation.en: Motherly at heart, I yearn to have a family to feed.
translation.zh: 我内心充满母爱 我向往为家人做菜

translation.en: An economist by day,
translation.zh: 白天 我是个经济学家

translation.en: I live a quiet, traditional life by night.
translation.zh: 入夜后 我过着平凡安静的生活

translation.en: My hobbies include fine dining
translation.zh: 我的爱好包括到高级餐厅用餐

translation.en: and relaxing at home.
translation.zh: 以及在家懒洋洋地放松

translation.en: A natural-born athlete,
translation.zh: 我天生擅长运动

translation.en: with boundless energy.
translation.zh: 拥有无穷无尽的能量

translation.en: I'm seeking my Indian Prince Charming…
translation.zh: 我在寻找我的印度白马王子

translation.en: …with a professional job and MBA.
translation.zh: 他必须是专业人士 拥有工商管理硕士学位

translation.en: At heart, I'm just a simple girl
translation.zh: 我内心里只是个平凡的女孩

translation.en: who loves weddings.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢出席婚礼了

translation.en: ♪ Do it in the pictures Show me love ♪ ♪ And what's it gonna be ♪
translation.zh: （拉克丝米和贾玛）

translation.en: And I dream of having a grand one of my own someday.
translation.zh: 我梦想将来办一场世纪婚礼

translation.en: Don't do it.
translation.zh: 别按

translation.en: -[man] Look alive. Meeting's in 20. -Huh?
translation.zh: 醒醒 20分钟后开会

translation.en: “Singapore equals economic miracle.”
translation.zh: “新加坡是经济奇迹的代名词”

translation.en: Brilliant.
translation.zh: 写得好

translation.en: Please tell me you've slept.
translation.zh: 求你告诉我你睡饱了

translation.en: Oh. Yeah, I slept. I slept for 56 minutes.
translation.zh: 我睡饱了 睡了整整56分钟

translation.en: Asha, stop killing yourself. This is what you've been waiting for.
translation.zh: 别再自我毁灭了 这是你期待已久的一刻

translation.en: It's all on you.
translation.zh: 成败都靠你了

translation.en: Now, get it together and prove to my boss in London
translation.zh: 振作起来 你要证明给我的上司看

translation.en: that I'm a genius for stealing you from Wall St.
translation.zh: 我当初把你从华尔街撬过来 是个聪明绝顶的决定

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: -[woman] They're early! -[tapping on glass]
translation.zh: 他们来早了！

translation.en: They just entered the building. That's what you're wearing?
translation.zh: 他们刚踏进大楼 你打算这么穿吗？

translation.en: I had a family thing last night. Black or navy?
translation.zh: 我昨晚亲戚家办喜事 黑色还是海军蓝？

translation.en: -Black, definitely black. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 黑色 必须是黑色

translation.en: -Or maybe the navy? -Tina!
translation.zh: -还是海军蓝好了 -蒂娜！

translation.en: Some privacy, please?
translation.zh: 给我一点隐私 好吗？

translation.en: Singapore is a place where economic miracles happen.
translation.zh: 新加坡是经济奇迹发生的地方

translation.en: And today, you have the opportunity to help spread that miracle.
translation.zh: 今天你们有机会把这个奇迹散播出去

translation.en: Your investment is key to establishing our Southeast Asia loan initiative.
translation.zh: 你们的资金 是我们开拓东南亚贷款市场的关键

translation.en: Which would launch Singapore as a powder…
translation.zh: 到时新加坡将成为一个强大的…

translation.en: …ful, powerful…
translation.zh: 强大的…

translation.en: Powder…
translation.zh: “火”大的…

translation.en: Pow… Powerful--
translation.zh: 强大的…

translation.en: Is something wrong here?
translation.zh: 是不是出了什么状况？

translation.en: No, of course not.
translation.zh: 没有 当然没有

translation.en: Uh, definitely not. Definitely not.
translation.zh: 绝对没有

translation.en: The…
translation.zh: 那个…

translation.en: This is your chance to establish Singapore as a center--
translation.zh: 这是你们将新加坡设为策略中心…

translation.en: [Mrs. Tan] Okay, let's get to it.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们说重点好了

translation.en: Micro loans aren't a cure for poverty. It's one piece of a puzzle.
translation.zh: 微型贷款无法根治贫困问题 解决贫困只是其中一个难题

translation.en: Why Asia and why now? What's the strategy?
translation.zh: 为什么选择亚洲？ 为什么是现在？你们有什么策略？

translation.en: Oh, well, we have 140 million borrowers, 80% women, 65% rural.
translation.zh: 我们公司有一亿四千万的借贷者 其中80%是女性 65%是小农

translation.en: Our annual growth is 12% with a projected portfolio yield of--
translation.zh: 我们公司年均增长率为12% 我们预计投资组合将带来…

translation.en: -Your numbers are impressive. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你们公司的数据令人大开眼界 -谢谢

translation.en: But what's the heart of your story?
translation.zh: 但你们故事的核心是什么？

translation.en: [whispers] Heart?
translation.zh: 核心？

translation.en: We believe that women
translation.zh: 我们相信女性

translation.en: are key to social change by creating a more sustainable future--
translation.zh: 是社会改革的关键 通过创造更持久的未来…

translation.en: Ms. Maurya, we believe in your fund's potential to do good.
translation.zh: 莫亚小姐 我们相信你们公司 一定会将资金用来做好事

translation.en: But right now, we're just not seeing your vision.
translation.zh: 只是我们无法看见你的愿景

translation.en: [Asha] I mean, the vision is…
translation.zh: 我们的愿景是…

translation.en: -It's clear in the next slide. -It's okay, Asha.
translation.zh: -就在下一页中 -行了

translation.en: [Asha] If you could give me one more…
translation.zh: 只要再给我多一点…

translation.en: That went well.
translation.zh: 很顺利

translation.en: I think.
translation.zh: 起码我是这么想的

translation.en: I can't believe my mom sent a guy to work today of all days.
translation.zh: 我妈竟然叫一个男人到我办公室找我

translation.en: Don’t blame Mommy. We’ve all botched pitches like that.
translation.zh: 别怪妈妈 我们都搞砸了这场推介会

translation.en: Shake it off, move on.
translation.zh: 放下 继续努力

translation.en: I can see why you’re upset. This is all lies.
translation.zh: 我知道为什么你不高兴 上面对你的描述都是假的

translation.en: You're not a natural in the kitchen. You're certainly not a simple girl.
translation.zh: 你不是厨艺高手 也不是平凡的女孩

translation.en: Can you take that down?
translation.zh: 能帮我删掉吗？

translation.en: I can't because she's changed the password.
translation.zh: 不行 你妈把密码改了

translation.en: Oh my God, this is a nightmare.
translation.zh: 天啊 这简直是一场噩梦

translation.en: I think he's got a kind of hot accountant vibe.
translation.zh: 他散发出一种会计师男神的气质

translation.en: Like he could do times tables in his head.
translation.zh: 仿佛可以把日程表记在脑海里似的

translation.en: -[sighs] -Are we still going out for coffee or…
translation.zh: 我们还去不去喝咖啡？

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, um…
translation.zh: 听好 对不起

translation.en: But this is my mother's fault. So…
translation.zh: 这都是我妈的错 所以…

translation.en: Yeah. Mine too.
translation.zh: 对啊 这也是我妈搞出来的

translation.en: -Handle him. -Yep.
translation.zh: -麻烦你送他出去 -好的

translation.en: [woman] Sir.
translation.zh: 先生

translation.en: Just…
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: This is for you. Call me.
translation.zh: 这是给你的 打给我

translation.en: Please tell me you can get me another shot.
translation.zh: 拜托你告诉我 你可以替我争取到多一个机会

translation.en: I'll try.
translation.zh: 我会尽力的

translation.en: And if I succeed, you'll have to show them
translation.zh: 如果我争取到了 你就要证明给他们看

translation.en: why Asha Maurya cares about this so damn much.
translation.zh: 你艾莎·莫亚很重视这个项目的原因

translation.en: We're not bankers. We're beggars.
translation.zh: 我们不是银行家 而是乞丐

translation.en: If we can't tell a good story, our little tin cups remain empty.
translation.zh: 如果说不出一个好故事 杯子里一毛钱也没有

translation.en: You ruined my pitch.
translation.zh: 你搞砸了我的推介会

translation.en: Give me a heart attack while you die alone in a gutter?
translation.zh: 你想孤独地死在水沟里 让我心脏病发作吗？

translation.en: Mom, you can't send a DesiDream date to somebody's place of employment.
translation.zh: 妈妈 叫相亲对象 去办公室找人是不对的

translation.en: Employment? This job doesn't pay Asha enough to buy a condo.
translation.zh: 办公室？这份工作还不足以 让艾莎买下一间高级公寓呢

translation.en: -Condos are a sound investment. -I don't want one.
translation.zh: -高级公寓是一项不错的投资 -我不要高级公寓

translation.en: You should've never left banking. Your whole future was secure!
translation.zh: 你当初不应该离开银行界 如今你的未来都毁了

translation.en: -I got it. -Oh, here we go again.
translation.zh: -我来搭把手吧 -又来了

translation.en: Suneeta, don't make enemies with a crocodile that shares your waters.
translation.zh: 苏妮塔 别与同一个水域的鳄鱼为敌

translation.en: You know, that is so true, Mr. M. About crocodiles.
translation.zh: 伯父 这鳄鱼的比拟也太贴切了

translation.en: You're an economist, Vijay, not a greeting card writer.
translation.zh: 你是经济学家 不是贺卡写手

translation.en: I'm just sharing wisdom of their dada-ji.
translation.zh: 我只是跟他们分享哒哒吉的教诲

translation.en: Nick, that's Priya's grandfather.
translation.zh: 尼克 “哒哒吉”是指普莉雅的爷爷

translation.en: Did she tell you about his boat?
translation.zh: 她有没有跟你说过 她爷爷以前有一艘船？

translation.en: -Please, Dad. No. -Boat? No.
translation.zh: -老爸 别说了 -一艘船？没提过

translation.en: -[Nick] I love boats. -So boring.
translation.zh: -我最喜欢船了 -很没劲儿的故事

translation.en: Okay, Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈 听好

translation.en: All I'm asking is that you take down this biodata and stop arranging dates.
translation.zh: 我只要你拿下我的个人资料 别再给我安排相亲了

translation.en: -Sorry, bio what? -Biodata.
translation.zh: -什么？个人… -个人资料

translation.en: Like a resume, except your mom writes it. Instead of getting a job, you get married.
translation.zh: 犹如一份履历表 但是你妈写的 目的不是找工作 而是结婚

translation.en: No, no, no, no. This is not biodata. This is a modern online profile.
translation.zh: 不是 这不是个人资料 这是现代网络帐户

translation.en: A nice way to meet a nice boy like this.
translation.zh: 这种方法很适合用来结识这种乖男孩

translation.en: -Meet Ravishanka Shah. -Suneeta.
translation.zh: -他是拉维山卡·萨 -苏妮塔

translation.en: Youngest Indian to win the National Spelling Bee.
translation.zh: 全国拼字比赛 最年轻的印度籍冠军得主

translation.en: -Mom. -Went to MIT at 16.
translation.zh: -妈妈 -16岁就进了麻省理工学院

translation.en: -Mom. -Look, look!
translation.zh: 听好！

translation.en: "Hello, I'm a very good boy. I studied at MIT. I run a successful--"
translation.zh: “你好 我是个很乖、很听话的孩子 毕业于麻省理工学院 -我有一个成功的…” -妈妈！

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: -我有一个成功的…” -妈妈！

translation.en: This poor boy's ma wrote this. He has no idea it exists.
translation.zh: 这份个人资料是他妈妈写的 这个可怜的孩子并不知情

translation.en: [Vijay] Suneeta.
translation.zh: 苏妮塔

translation.en: Enjoy your feast. This arguing is chewing my brains.
translation.zh: 好好吃饭 听你们争吵不休 我的头痛得要命

translation.en: Enjoy. This plate is for the husband who should be here.
translation.zh: 好好吃？ 这个空盘子是给缺席的女婿准备的

translation.en: I told her not to do this. Don't get mad at me.
translation.zh: 我劝过她别这么做的 别生我的气

translation.en: Well, I will be calling you Mom soon enough.
translation.zh: 我很快就要称呼你“妈妈”了

translation.en: Oh, this biryani looks so good.
translation.zh: 这盘印度香饭看起来很好吃的样子

translation.en: It's just rice.
translation.zh: 这只是白米饭

translation.en: And we don't really roll our Rs.
translation.zh: 没必要强调卷舌音

translation.en: -[sighs] -Careful, it's spicy.
translation.zh: 小心点 很辣

translation.en: -I love sp-- [coughs] -Oh!
translation.zh: 我爱吃辣

translation.en: [Priya] You okay, babe?
translation.zh: 你还好吧？

translation.en: Mom, I'm not gonna meet this Ravi guy.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我绝对不会去见 这个叫拉维的男人

translation.en: Fine. Make me a liar.
translation.zh: 很好 那我岂不是说谎骗人了？

translation.en: My God. You already told his mom I'm gonna meet him, didn't you?
translation.zh: 天啊 你已经跟他妈妈说好 我会去见他了 对吧？

translation.en: Beta, I can't let you give up just because of that bekaar Krish.
translation.zh: 我不希望你因为那个没用的克里什 而放弃幸福啊！

translation.en: Krish? This isn't about Krish. Why does everyone think it is? It's not!
translation.zh: 克里什？这事跟克里什无关 为什么大家都认为跟他有关？

translation.en: -Calm down. -I am over it. Why can't you be? God!
translation.zh: -冷静点 -我放下了 你们怎么还放不下？天啊

translation.en: Why would you mention Krish?
translation.zh: 为什么非要提到克里什？

translation.en: Well, what am I supposed to do?
translation.zh: 那我能怎么办？

translation.en: [exhales] Just keep calm and curry on.
translation.zh: 保持镇定 继续吃咖喱

translation.en: -No, stop. -I don't know why I said that.
translation.zh: -别说了 -我怎么会说出那个段子？

translation.en: [Priya] Hey. You okay, sis?
translation.zh: 姐 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: [Priya] Okay, I need you to do me a favor.
translation.zh: 帮个忙 好吗？

translation.en: You and Mom can't go on like this. I have too much on my plate.
translation.zh: 你和妈妈不能再闹下去了 我要处理的事够多了

translation.en: And I don't want Mom to be miserable at my wedding.
translation.zh: 我不要妈妈在我的婚礼上板着脸

translation.en: So you want me to be miserable instead?
translation.zh: 那你就要我板着脸吗？

translation.en: It's one date.
translation.zh: 不过是一个相亲对象

translation.en: It's a lie, Pri.
translation.zh: 这是在骗人 普莉雅

translation.en: -You lied about other boyfriends. -Shh.
translation.zh: -你也瞒着妈妈交过好几个男朋友啊 -小声点

translation.en: -[whispers] Not in front of them. -[Priya] You mean Ganesh and his gods?
translation.zh: -别在他们面前说 -你是指象头神和他的神队友吗？

translation.en: -[Asha] Yeah. -They already know.
translation.zh: -对啊 -他们都知道了

translation.en: Come on, I was 16. There was nothing to tell.
translation.zh: 得了吧 当年我才16岁 没什么好说的

translation.en: Honestly, I don't think Mom and Dad want to know the truth.
translation.zh: 说真的 我认为爸妈并不想知道 我们到底做过什么

translation.en: The fact we used to sneak out to watch R-rated films?
translation.zh: 你是指偷溜出去看限制级电影吗？

translation.en: Or the fact that you and Nick freaking live together?
translation.zh: 还是指你和尼克同居的秘密？

translation.en: Shh.
translation.zh: 小声点

translation.en: Can you please help me out here?
translation.zh: 求求你帮个忙 好吗？

translation.en: Be a maverick in three months.
translation.zh: 在接下来三个月内 继续当个独立独行的人

translation.en: In the meantime, if you want to be left alone,
translation.zh: 与此同时 如果你不想让他们干涉你的生活

translation.en: go on the date.
translation.zh: 就去见那个相亲对象

translation.en: Okay, fine. I'll meet your little MIT genius.
translation.zh: 好吧 我答应去见 你说的那个麻省理工学院天才

translation.en: But no more setups and you have to take down that profile.
translation.zh: 但之后别再给我安排相亲了 还要删除我的帐户

translation.en: Okay, okay, as long as you agree to go to the weddings also.
translation.zh: 好的 但前提是你要答应我 去出席这些婚礼

translation.en: -What? -It's the best place to find a husband.
translation.zh: -什么？ -婚礼是找老公最理想的地方

translation.en: I thought online was.
translation.zh: 不是网络吗？

translation.en: That's also best.
translation.zh: 网络也是

translation.en: Mom, I have a life.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我有自己的人生

translation.en: This is your life too.
translation.zh: 这也是你的人生

translation.en: You see this one?
translation.zh: 看到这张请帖吗？

translation.en: Sona's father picked us up from the airport when we moved to this country.
translation.zh: 当初我们刚搬来美国时 是索娜的父亲到机场接我们

translation.en: We had nothing. Eight dollars and the clothes on our backs.
translation.zh: 当年我们什么都没有 身上只有八块钱和几件衣服

translation.en: Really? What was in your suitcases?
translation.zh: 是吗？那行李箱里装着什么？

translation.en: The clothes that weren't on our backs.
translation.zh: 没穿在身上的衣服

translation.en: And this one.
translation.zh: 还有这一家人

translation.en: Rohit’s mom took care of you when Priya was born.
translation.zh: 普莉雅出生时 是罗西的妈妈替我照顾你的

translation.en: That was Kumail's mom.
translation.zh: 其实是库马尔的妈妈

translation.en: No. I remember Kumail's mom was having her gallbladder out. It was Rohit's mom.
translation.zh: 不是 我记得当时库马尔的妈妈 在做胆囊切除术 肯定是罗西的妈妈

translation.en: Okay, guys, I… I know that these are your friends--
translation.zh: 行了 我知道这些人都是你们的朋友

translation.en: Not friends, Asha. Family. Community.
translation.zh: 不是朋友 艾莎 是家人 是社群

translation.en: To you these are just weddings, but to us this is a celebration of a life we built.
translation.zh: 在你看来 这些只是婚礼 但在我们看来 这些庆祝我们努力打拼换来的生活

translation.en: From eight dollars.
translation.zh: 一切从八块钱开始

translation.en: Do you understand that I may not want a husband or partner in my life?
translation.zh: 你们知不知道 我这辈子可能不想结婚吗？

translation.en: Oh! No! [sobbing]
translation.zh: 天啊 不会吧？

translation.en: -No! -Suneeta?
translation.zh: -不行 -苏妮塔

translation.en: Oh, beta. I can't let you give up on a lifetime of happiness.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 妈妈不准你 就这样放弃一辈子的幸福

translation.en: Beta, we just want what's best for you.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我们都是为了你好

translation.en: I know what you're doing.
translation.zh: 我知道你们在演哪出戏

translation.en: You always do this.
translation.zh: 每次都出这一招

translation.en: Fine. I'll go to some weddings.
translation.zh: 好吧 我去参加几场婚礼就是了

translation.en: -Not some. All. Show we're not ashamed. -Mom.
translation.zh: -场场都得去 给人家看我们多大方 -妈妈

translation.en: Look, if you do this, I'll take down your profile.
translation.zh: 如果你答应我 我就删除你的帐户

translation.en: -Great. -But you still have to meet Ravi.
translation.zh: -好啊 -但你还是得跟拉维见面

translation.en: I have a good feeling about him.
translation.zh: 我有预感这个人不错

translation.en: -No. -Please.
translation.zh: -我不去 -求你了

translation.en: -Mom, no! -Yes.
translation.zh: -我不去！ -一定要去！

translation.en: -Mom! No! -Chup!
translation.zh: -妈妈 我不去 -闭嘴

translation.en: [chuckles] Ravishankar Shah?
translation.zh: 你是拉维山卡·萨？

translation.en: -Oh. Hi! Um, just-- -Ravi?
translation.zh: -你好 叫我… -拉维吗？

translation.en: Just Ravi.
translation.zh: 叫我拉维就好了

translation.en: -Do you mind if we order? I'm starving. -Sure. Um, nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -介意马上点餐吗？我快饿坏了 -没问题 幸会

translation.en: What'll it be?
translation.zh: 想点些什么？

translation.en: Hi. Let me get a double-cheddar burger, sloppy fries, large, and a water. Thanks.
translation.zh: 一份双切达汉堡、大份奶酪酱炸薯条 再来一杯清水 谢谢

translation.en: And he'll have a… What do you have for “strict vegetarian seeks simple girl"?
translation.zh: 他要一份… 你们有没有叫 “寻找平凡女孩”的纯素套餐？

translation.en: Not strict, not vegetarian.
translation.zh: 我不是纯素食主义者

translation.en: I'll have the same. Just Coke, not water. Thank you.
translation.zh: 给我一份跟她一样的套餐 只要把清水换成可乐就行了 谢谢

translation.en: -[register keys chime] -That'll be…
translation.zh: 总共…

translation.en: Including 6.625 percent tax, 21.40.
translation.zh: 包含6.625%消费税 总共是21.40美元

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 厉害

translation.en: How'd you do that?
translation.zh: 你怎么办到的？

translation.en: Oh, just a simple girl thing. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这只是一个平凡女孩的看家本领

translation.en: [inhales] Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: -Shall we? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: So, Ravi, can you really spell anything?
translation.zh: 拉维 你真的任何单词都会拼吗？

translation.en: A-N-Y-T-H--
translation.zh: “任何单…”

translation.en: -Come on. Very funny. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 得了吧 你真觉得好笑吗？

translation.en: Spell "logorrhea."
translation.zh: 英文单词“Logorrhea”怎么拼？

translation.en: Listen, I don't dance on command. So…
translation.zh: 我不是那种喜欢被呼来唤去的人

translation.en: -Make your mom a liar? Spell "logorrhea." -Seriously? Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -那你妈岂不是在骗人吗？拼出来吧 -你是认真的吗？

translation.en: Oh my God. Okay. Logorrhea. L-O-G-O-R-R-H-E-A. Logorrhea.
translation.zh: 天啊 好吧 是“L-O-G-O-R-R-H-E-A”

translation.en: Well done.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -Thank you. -Definition?
translation.zh: -谢谢 -这个单词是什么意思？

translation.en: Verbal diarrhea. Actually a good word for you. Ah.
translation.zh: 是“语泻”的意思 很适合用来形容你

translation.en: Bon appétit.
translation.zh: 请慢用

translation.en: Your mom forgot to mention your wit. So subtle and sophisticated.
translation.zh: 你妈忘了提到 你是个才思敏捷、有深度的人

translation.en: -Yeah, yours left out a couple things too. -Okay, fine. Here it goes.
translation.zh: -你妈也漏写了好几个点 -好吧 那我们开始吧

translation.en: Uh, I blew up my engagement to Jersey’s most eligible brown bachelor,
translation.zh: 我撕毁了跟新泽西州 最受欢迎印度单身汉的婚约

translation.en: alienated my closest friends, brought shame and calumny on my family.
translation.zh: 刻意疏离我的好朋友 使家人蒙受污名和耻辱

translation.en: I’m no longer allowed on public transport in Woodbridge.
translation.zh: 还被禁止使用 伍德布里奇镇的公交服务

translation.en: But that was a misunderstanding.
translation.zh: 那其实是一场误会

translation.en: Yeah, I was just gonna say you're prettier in person.
translation.zh: 我只想说你本人比较漂亮

translation.en: Did your mom write that too?
translation.zh: 这也是你妈给你写的台词吗？

translation.en: No, that was actually all me.
translation.zh: 不是 我自己说的

translation.en: Ravi.
translation.zh: 拉维

translation.en: Asha.
translation.zh: 艾莎

translation.en: Literally, the only reason I agreed to meet you here
translation.zh: 说真的 我答应见你

translation.en: was so my mom would stop posting my profile online.
translation.zh: 是为了让我妈删除 我在相亲网站上的帐户

translation.en: So this…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: Us…
translation.zh: 我们…

translation.en: …is never gonna happen.
translation.zh: 是不可能的？

translation.en: Never gonna happen.
translation.zh: 是不可能的

translation.en: How can you be so sure?
translation.zh: 你就这么肯定吗？

translation.en: Because our parents set this up.
translation.zh: 因为这是我们父母安排的

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 那又如何？

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 那又如何？

translation.en: Wow. Okay. Um, how about this? I just started a new job.
translation.zh: 天啊 那我就老实说了 我刚换工作

translation.en: It's consuming my life. I have no time for anything else, and I'm okay with that.
translation.zh: 新工作把我累坏了 我没时间谈恋爱 也不介意单身

translation.en: I just took a break from my job, which was consuming my life.
translation.zh: 我刚刚开始休假 因为那份工作也把我累坏了

translation.en: I have all the time in the world, and I'm okay with that.
translation.zh: 我有的是时间 也很乐意谈恋爱

translation.en: So you basically, like, don't have a job?
translation.zh: 那你算是无业游民 对吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, actually, I--
translation.zh: 其实 我…

translation.en: What happened to being the start-up guy?
translation.zh: 你不是初创企业家吗？

translation.en: I made money off a start-up, but it's not who I am.
translation.zh: 我以前创业时确实挣了点钱 但我不喜欢那种生活

translation.en: I prefer to do what I love.
translation.zh: 我更想做自己爱做的事

translation.en: Most can't afford to make that choice.
translation.zh: 大部分人都没有这种选择

translation.en: See, that's interesting. Can't afford to or are afraid to?
translation.zh: 这句话可有意思了 是没有选择？还是害怕？

translation.en: See? We're doomed.
translation.zh: 看吧 我们注定没有结果

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Oh, cheer up. You dodged a bullet.
translation.zh: 笑一个吧 你刚躲过了一劫

translation.en: Anyway, a girl must eat.
translation.zh: 女人不能不吃饭

translation.en: I'm gonna go.
translation.zh: 我该走了

translation.en: -Okay. -Yeah. But, um…
translation.zh: -好吧 -好的 不过…

translation.en: Thank you. This has been interesting.
translation.zh: 谢谢 跟你见面很有意思

translation.en: -Thanks for the burger. -Anytime.
translation.zh: -谢谢你的汉堡 -不客气

translation.en: Bon appétit.
translation.zh: 你慢用

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Ravi] Whoo! Happy birthday, Pops.
translation.zh: 老爸 生日快乐！

translation.en: So, Mr. Senior Citizen, how does it feel?
translation.zh: 老先生 有什么感想？

translation.en: Who'd have thought I’d be father to a man in his 30s who still acts like a child?
translation.zh: 谁会想到我儿子都30岁了 行为还像个小孩一样？

translation.en: [Veena] Not today, Dinesh. Ravi is here.
translation.zh: 迪内什 拉维难得在场 今天就别说这个了

translation.en: I got you this gift.
translation.zh: 我给你买了礼物

translation.en: No, no, no. No presents.
translation.zh: 我不要你的礼物

translation.en: I cannot enjoy my birthday until my son finds a wife.
translation.zh: 在我的儿子找到老婆之前 我无法开开心心地庆生

translation.en: He's trying. He went out with Asha.
translation.zh: 他在努力了 他去见了艾莎

translation.en: Ha! And realized that women want men not boys?
translation.zh: 他知道女人要的是男人 不是男孩吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Dinesh.
translation.zh: 迪内什

translation.en: Dad, you wrote this misleading profile of me.
translation.zh: 你给我写了一篇 充满误导性的个人介绍

translation.en: Saying, "Looking for a simple girl." I don't want simple. Simple is boring.
translation.zh: 写什么“寻找平凡的女孩” 我不要平凡的女孩 平凡没劲儿

translation.en: You can't be so choosy.
translation.zh: 你不能太挑剔

translation.en: -Dad, I'm proud of my life. -Oh, good.
translation.zh: -老爸 我对自己的人生感到自豪 -很好

translation.en: Proud of no job, proud of never dating, proud of that T-shirt.
translation.zh: 对没工作、没有过对象感到自豪？ 对那件衬衫感到自豪？

translation.en: You were so brilliant, Ravi. Huh? MIT!
translation.zh: 你以前多么出色啊 还考进了麻省理工学院！

translation.en: Dinesh, what's past is past.
translation.zh: 迪内什 过去的事就让它过去吧

translation.en: But now is the time for you to find a good girl.
translation.zh: 但你的确该找个好对象了

translation.en: -Mom. -Good, not boring.
translation.zh: -妈妈 -找个带劲儿的好对象

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with boring.
translation.zh: 没劲儿也没错啊

translation.en: Please, beta. Just try.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 求你了 去试试看

translation.en: For me.
translation.zh: 就当是为了我

translation.en: Okay fine, Mom. I'll try.
translation.zh: 好吧 妈妈 我会试试看

translation.en: Look what I found.
translation.zh: 看我找到了什么？

translation.en: Files on your secret love affair with a British royal?
translation.zh: 你和英国皇室成员 秘密交往的机密档案？

translation.en: Those were destroyed.
translation.zh: 那些档案已经被销毁了

translation.en: These are case studies of every microloan our company has ever funded.
translation.zh: 这是我们公司 历年来的微型贷款研究案例

translation.en: Plus, a 1997 swimsuit edition of Foxy Gals magazine.
translation.zh: 还有一本 1997年出版的成人杂志泳装特辑

translation.en: Now, I know this isn't yours.
translation.zh: 我知道不是你的

translation.en: Don't be so sure. I did go to college.
translation.zh: 别一口咬定不是我的 我也当过大学生

translation.en: So folders. Like the 1800s?
translation.zh: 这些都是古代留下的档案？

translation.en: More like the last 25 years.
translation.zh: 说是过去25年留下的档案更贴切点

translation.en: I want you to analyze these and learn what we do, how we do it, and why we do it.
translation.zh: 我要你好好分析 学习我们公司的作风、做法和初衷

translation.en: -[Asha] That could take all summer. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 这要一整个夏天才看得完吧

translation.en: I want you to be so brilliant, Singapore can't say no.
translation.zh: 我要你出色得 连新加坡客户也拒绝不了你

translation.en: But they did say no.
translation.zh: 但我已经被新加坡客户拒绝了

translation.en: I spoke to the higher-ups in London and a personal friend.
translation.zh: 我跟伦敦的高层 和一个私底下的好友说了

translation.en: They'll see if they can pull strings to bring them back.
translation.zh: 他们会帮我们牵线 看看能不能让他们回来

translation.en: -If you screw up this time… -Heads will roll.
translation.zh: -如果这次你又糊了… -那就人头落地

translation.en: [man] That's a bit medieval.
translation.zh: 那是古代的做法

translation.en: But yes, your head and mine.
translation.zh: 但如果真糊了 我们的确会人头落地

translation.en: I'll also probably lose my job. I'll have to take my kid out of preschool.
translation.zh: 我也很可能会失业 到时我的孩子就无法再去上学前班

translation.en: -There goes Princeton! -Ambitious, this one.
translation.zh: -以后也进不了普林斯顿大学 -这个女人野心好大

translation.en: Come, come.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: -Mom, I'm at work. -Oh, no. Don't "I'm at work" me.
translation.zh: -妈 我还在上班 -别用这种借口打发我

translation.en: Now what did I do?
translation.zh: 我又做错了什么？

translation.en: -You behaved like a total fool! -What?
translation.zh: -你跟一个驴脑没两样 -什么？

translation.en: Pooja Patel told me you gave Ravi Shah diarrhea!
translation.zh: 普佳·帕特尔跟我说 你害拉维·萨腹泻了

translation.en: What? No! I asked him to spell logorrhea.
translation.zh: 我哪有？我只是叫他拼出 “logorrhea”这个单词

translation.en: -What's that? -Verbal diarrhea.
translation.zh: -那是什么意思？ -语泻

translation.en: You mean diarrhea from the mo…
translation.zh: 你是指呕吐…

translation.en: Oh. Well, you better behave at the next wedding or our deal is off!
translation.zh: 下一场婚礼上 你最好给我老实点 不然我们说好的就不算数

translation.en: [Hindu priest] Today, our bride and groom come together
translation.zh: 今天 新郎新娘聚在这里

translation.en: to celebrate both the Hindu and Jewish traditions,
translation.zh: 庆祝印度和犹太文化的结合

translation.en: to learn the best of what each has to offer,
translation.zh: 互相学习彼此的好

translation.en: confirming that love, spoken of in all religions,
translation.zh: 并且确立这份爱 正如所有宗教说说

translation.en: is our true meeting place.
translation.zh: 爱是我们相聚一堂的原因

translation.en: It is their promise to be honest, open, loyal, and devoted to one another.
translation.zh: 他们承诺将对彼此 坦诚、忠贞 并且相亲相爱

translation.en: This responsibility speaks of faith and the love and support of your friends.
translation.zh: 这份责任代表着信仰 以及来自亲友的爱与支持

translation.en: [wedding guest] Mazel tov!
translation.zh: 恭喜！

translation.en: I lost Nick to the uncles.
translation.zh: 尼克被大叔们缠住了

translation.en: Better than the bridesmaids.
translation.zh: 比伴娘团还要受欢迎

translation.en: Beats getting hit on by that spelling bee nerd.
translation.zh: 他被一个 拿过拼字比赛冠军的宅男搭讪

translation.en: "Hi, I'm Ravi. I went to MIT. Wanna play Bananagrams with me?"
translation.zh: “你好 我是拉维 麻省理工学院毕业 要不要玩香蕉拼字游戏？”

translation.en: "No, thanks, Mr. Nerd. I'd rather clean a shower drain."
translation.zh: “不了 谢谢 宅男先生 我宁可去清理水沟”

translation.en: -You're the nerd. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你就是那个宅男

translation.en: Yeah. I'm a nerd. I'm a nerd. I love nerds.
translation.zh: 我也是个宅女 我最喜欢宅男了

translation.en: SAT scores through the roof!
translation.zh: 我的高考成绩可是名列前茅的

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna go. -Good save, though. Smooth. -Yeah. Yep.
translation.zh: -好了 我走了 -救场成功 很顺

translation.en: You look thirsty.
translation.zh: 你好像渴了

translation.en: Uh, I was actually just leaving.
translation.zh: 其实我打算离开了

translation.en: Oh, you're leaving this time?
translation.zh: 你要走了？

translation.en: -Why tell Pooja Patel about our date? -Pooja who?
translation.zh: 为什么把我们相亲的事 告诉普佳·帕特尔？ 谁是普佳·帕特尔？

translation.en: Pooja Patel, the gossip queen of Little India?
translation.zh: 小印度区的八卦女王普佳·帕特尔

translation.en: I didn't tell anyone. Why would I tell someone?
translation.zh: 我没跟任何人说过 为什么这种事要跟别人说？

translation.en: Huh. She was spying on us.
translation.zh: 她在监视我们

translation.en: Unbelievable.
translation.zh: 太离谱了

translation.en: Asha, darling.
translation.zh: 艾莎 亲爱的

translation.en: Ravi. Did you call my niece Twinkle?
translation.zh: 拉维 你给我的侄女小晶 打电话了吗？

translation.en: [Sheela Auntie] She's Miss India, New Jersey, you know.
translation.zh: 人家可是新泽西州印度美后 你懂的

translation.en: -Nah, Pinky Au-- -She's no brain like you, huh?
translation.zh: -没有 红姨 -你嫌她没有你聪明 对吧？

translation.en: But a spelling bee is no Nobel Prize.
translation.zh: 你只是拼字比赛冠军 又不是诺贝尔奖得主

translation.en: Pinky, leave Ravi. Ravi has time. But Asha.
translation.zh: 红姨 你就饶了拉维吧 拉维有的是时间 艾莎可不同了

translation.en: Suneeta must be desperate.
translation.zh: 苏妮塔肯定急坏了

translation.en: All these doctors and lawyers and PhDs, they will be snapped up in no time.
translation.zh: 医生、律师、博士很快就会被抢光了

translation.en: And you will be stuck with leftovers.
translation.zh: 到时你只能捡剩下的

translation.en: Think of the shame! Krish getting married to a younger woman so soon.
translation.zh: 说到奇耻大辱 克里什就快结婚了 新娘是个更年轻的女人

translation.en: -Oh my God. You didn't know. Bechari. -Bechari, Asha, beti. Arre.
translation.zh: -天啊 你不知道吗？真可怜 -艾莎 我真同情你

translation.en: You know, really, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我不在乎

translation.en: No. You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: Best thing, you get your revenge and get engaged quickly.
translation.zh: 你现在能做的就是赶紧订婚报复他

translation.en: Oh, I'm not looking for revenge.
translation.zh: 我没打算报复

translation.en: I'm looking for a bit of time to focus on my career.
translation.zh: 我先要腾出时间专心经营事业

translation.en: Darling, careers fade away, but a husband and a family?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 事业不是永久的 唯有丈夫和家人…

translation.en: Those are forever, darling.
translation.zh: 才是永久的 亲爱的

translation.en: They're handing out wedding favors if you wanna…
translation.zh: 他们在送婚礼小礼物了

translation.en: Beta, don't worry.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 放心吧

translation.en: We promise not to give up on you until we know that you're happy.
translation.zh: 我们答应你 在你找到幸福之前 绝对不会放弃你

translation.en: Happy.
translation.zh: 幸福？

translation.en: -A hundred percent. -Yes.
translation.zh: -当然了 -是的

translation.en: But… can't you see?
translation.zh: 可是你们看不出吗？

translation.en: I am happy.
translation.zh: 我很幸福啊

translation.en: Thrilled, in fact, 'cause I met someone too.
translation.zh: 简直开心到飞起 因为我找到对象了

translation.en: My Indian Prince Charming right here.
translation.zh: 我的印度白马王子就在我身边

translation.en: You two? [giggles] No, no, no.
translation.zh: 你们两个交往了？不可能

translation.en: I heard from Pooja Patel it was a disaster.
translation.zh: 我听普佳·帕特尔说 你们见面时简直是灾难现场

translation.en: Disaster? Us? No.
translation.zh: 灾难现场？我们？哪有？

translation.en: We are the opposite of disaster. We are perfect together.
translation.zh: 跟灾难正好相反 我们简直天生一对

translation.en: Aren't we, Rav? Ravi?
translation.zh: 对吧 拉维？

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -[Asha] Ravster.
translation.zh: 这是“拉莎恋”

translation.en: She's the simple girl I always wanted, you know? Right, Asha? Shh.
translation.zh: 她就是我一直 在寻找的平凡女孩 对吧 艾莎？

translation.en: Very good. Good luck to you and your simple girl.
translation.zh: 祝你和你的平凡女孩交往顺利

translation.en: Chalo, Pinky. Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧 红姨

translation.en: We'll see.
translation.zh: 等着瞧

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.zh: 不会吧？

translation.en: -They're gone, aren't they? -Yeah, to spread the news.
translation.zh: -她们不是走了吗？ -可是她们会到处散播消息

translation.en: Come on, I'll just tell them we broke up at the next wedding.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会在下一场婚礼上 宣布我们已经分手了

translation.en: Then they'll just keep coming back. So, yeah, good luck.
translation.zh: 然后她们会继续缠着我们 加油

translation.en: -Wait. What if I didn't say that? -Okay.
translation.zh: 等等 如果我不说我们分手了呢？

translation.en: Would it be so bad to let people think we're off the market?
translation.zh: 让别人知道我们名花名草有主了 也不是坏事啊

translation.en: Is this how you're gonna ask me out?
translation.zh: 你在问我要不要跟你交往吗？

translation.en: I am not asking you out. Not for real, anyway.
translation.zh: 我没要跟你交往 只是假装跟你交往

translation.en: -I dunno where you're going with this. -You don't have to do anything!
translation.zh: -我不知道你在想什么 -你什么也不用做

translation.en: Just fend off the matchmaking aunties so I can get some work done.
translation.zh: 只要能帮我挡住那些媒婆 让我专心工作就可以了

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Hmm. What's in it for me?
translation.zh: 那我有什么好处？

translation.en: You get your life back.
translation.zh: 取回自己的人生

translation.en: I have my life.
translation.zh: 我已经有自己的人生了

translation.en: Uh, no, you don't.
translation.zh: 你没有

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: [Asha] Think about it. How many Indian weddings are you invited to?
translation.zh: 你被邀请参加多少场印度婚礼？

translation.en: -Sixteen. -Nineteen.
translation.zh: -16场 -我有19场

translation.en: We go to the ones we're both invited to. Brings it down to 14.
translation.zh: 我们只需要参加我们都受邀的婚礼 也就是14场

translation.en: -How'd you come up with that? -Math whiz. Don't question the numbers.
translation.zh: -你怎么算出来的？ -我是数学大师

translation.en: Well, Asha, I'm not even agreeing to one.
translation.zh: 艾莎 我都还没答应你

translation.en: If we join forces, we won't have to deal with all of this.
translation.zh: 如果我们联手 就不用面对这种麻烦了

translation.en: -Some people enjoy this. -Do you, Ravi?
translation.zh: -有些人就喜欢参加婚礼 -那你喜欢吗？

translation.en: You wanna lie, tell everyone we're dating.
translation.zh: 严格说来 你就是想欺骗亲朋戚友我们在交往

translation.en: Not lie, just role-play until wedding season's over.
translation.zh: 不是欺骗 只是角色扮演 直到婚礼季结束为止

translation.en: I'm offering you a choice.
translation.zh: 我给你一个选择

translation.en: Summer with me or summer with…
translation.zh: 跟我一起度过夏天 还是跟…

translation.en: her.
translation.zh: 她一起度过夏天

translation.en: Hi, Pinky Auntie.
translation.zh: 嗨 红姨

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna pass on both.
translation.zh: 两个都不要

translation.en: Fine, I'll pay you. Fifty bucks a wedding.
translation.zh: 好吧 我付钱给你 每场婚礼给你50美元

translation.en: God. You're kidding me.
translation.zh: 天啊 你在闹着玩的吧？

translation.en: -Seventy-five. -No.
translation.zh: -75美元 -不要

translation.en: -One hundred, final offer. -Five hundred.
translation.zh: 100美元 一口价 -500美元 -什么？

translation.en: -What? -I'm kidding. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -500美元 -什么？ 跟你闹着玩的

translation.en: Seriously, I'm not interested in a pretend relationship, okay?
translation.zh: 说真的 我对搞假恋情不感兴趣

translation.en: Can we please focus?
translation.zh: 不要搞错焦点 好吗？

translation.en: Don't be so selfish. Do this for your parents.
translation.zh: 别这么自私 就当是为了你爸妈

translation.en: At least until wedding season is over.
translation.zh: 起码坚持到婚礼季结束为止

translation.en: He agreed to fake date you? What's wrong with him?
translation.zh: 他竟然答应跟你假交往？他有病吗？

translation.en: Actually, what's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你有病吗？

translation.en: I'm a genius, that's what's wrong with me.
translation.zh: 我是天才 这就是我的病

translation.en: What you gonna do when mom finds out?
translation.zh: 万一被妈妈发现呢？

translation.en: She'll be thrilled. That's the whole point.
translation.zh: 她肯定开心到飞起 这就是我的主要目的

translation.en: How do half a billion women wear these things?
translation.zh: 世上五亿女性 是怎么穿上这身衣裳的？

translation.en: Yeah, she'll be thrilled until she finds out the truth.
translation.zh: 她会开心到飞起 直到她发现真相为止

translation.en: Relax. He's an MIT start-up founder. He's every mom's dream.
translation.zh: 别担心 他是麻省理工学院毕业的初创企业家 他是所有妈妈的梦想

translation.en: [sighs] And the best part is, nobody has to be miserable anymore.
translation.zh: 最开心的是 再也没有人会愁眉苦脸了

translation.en: Dad, please just let me buy you a new dishwasher?
translation.zh: 老爸 你就让我 给你买一部全新的洗碗机吧

translation.en: That is so typical of your generation, huh?
translation.zh: 这就是你们这一代年轻人的德行

translation.en: Throw money every time there's a little problem.
translation.zh: 遇到小麻烦就花钱解决

translation.en: You know, Dad, um, you'll be happy to hear this, actually, um…
translation.zh: 老爸 有件事你听了肯定会很高兴

translation.en: -I'm gonna see Asha again. -Oh really?
translation.zh: -我和艾莎约好再见一次面 -真的吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: She agreed?
translation.zh: 她答应了？

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, she agreed.
translation.zh: 对啊 老爸 她答应了

translation.en: To go out with you again?
translation.zh: 她答应跟你再见一次面？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 是的 老爸 我确定

translation.en: Bete, listen to me.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你听我说

translation.en: Don't let this opportunity pass you by. Act quickly.
translation.zh: 别错过这个大好机会 行动要快

translation.en: Okay Dad, we just met.
translation.zh: 老爸 我们刚认识不久

translation.en: Sure. But now is the time to make your move.
translation.zh: 我知道 但你是时候采取行动了

translation.en: Before she finds out what we've been up to.
translation.zh: 趁她还没发现我们的“诡计”前

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles] Listen Dad, I'm running late.
translation.zh: 好吧 老爸 我快迟到了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: Please don't hurt your back, okay?
translation.zh: 好好照顾你的背 好吗？

translation.en: Ravi, remember what your mother said.
translation.zh: 拉维 记住你妈说过的话

translation.en: The past is the past. There's no need to bring it up.
translation.zh: 过去的事就让它过去吧 没必要重提

translation.en: Shh.
translation.zh: 别说

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
translation.zh: 再见 老爸

translation.en: Veena, he's got another date!
translation.zh: 薇娜 我们儿子又去约会了！

translation.en: Hey, I have singles.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我有零钱

translation.en: Asha's happiness is worth more than one dollar.
translation.zh: 我们女儿的幸福何止一块钱？

translation.en: So is mine.
translation.zh: 我的幸福也很值钱啊

translation.en: Suneeta, you're quite the matchmaker, huh?
translation.zh: 苏妮塔 你这个媒人不错嘛

translation.en: Yes. Asha and Ravi made quite the cute couple at Sona's wedding.
translation.zh: 对啊 在索娜的婚礼上 艾莎和拉维看起来挺登对的

translation.en: -Really? -The spelling bee guy?
translation.zh: -是吗？ -那个拼字比赛冠军？

translation.en: You could even say, unbelievable.
translation.zh: 说“匪夷所思”也不为过

translation.en: What is so unbelievable about that?
translation.zh: 怎么说？

translation.en: Well, go and see for yourself.
translation.zh: 你自己去看吧

translation.en: [in Hindi] Hai raam.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [in English] Vijay, very handsome.
translation.zh: 维杰 你好帅啊

translation.en: -Oh, do you have change for a twenty? -Sure.
translation.zh: -你有没有20块零钱？ -当然有

translation.en: [Suneeta] Vijay!
translation.zh: 维杰！

translation.en: Vijay! Quickly. Quickly!
translation.zh: 维杰 快来啊！

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: -That's him. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是他了 -对啊

translation.en: -[Suneeta] He's tall. -[Vijay] He's sitting.
translation.zh: -他好高 -人家都没站起来

translation.en: Yeah, but you can tell.
translation.zh: 看得出来嘛

translation.en: Take a picture. Get your camera.
translation.zh: 拍张照 相机拿出来

translation.en: Some light reading?
translation.zh: 在看书吗？

translation.en: Oh. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: You work in finance, right?
translation.zh: 你从事金融专业吧？

translation.en: Um, microfinance.
translation.zh: 我从事微型金融

translation.en: Hmm, that's the tiny kind, right?
translation.zh: 就是小型金融 对吗？

translation.en: That's a bit reductive, but yeah.
translation.zh: 规模确实比较小 但你说得对

translation.en: I'm trying to create a lending initiative for women in Southeast Asia so they can start their own businesses.
translation.zh: 我想在东南亚推出一项贷款项目 协助当地女性创业

translation.en: Wow, okay. That is impressive.
translation.zh: 天啊 不错啊 很好

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Maybe read a couple of those and if we find time, do a lap around the room.
translation.zh: 你先读几篇文章吧 有时间的话 我们绕祈祷室一圈

translation.en: You know, say hi to the deities. Keep up appearances and stuff.
translation.zh: 跟神明打声招呼 露露脸

translation.en: -Maybe in a little while. -Okay.
translation.zh: -再等一下吧 -好的

translation.en: Or we could give tips to your brother-in-law on how to pray, 'cause…
translation.zh: 也可以教你未来妹夫怎么祈祷 因为…

translation.en: What is he doing?
translation.zh: 他在干什么？

translation.en: -You think he's gonna down dog? -It's very possible.
translation.zh: -他在做狗爬式吗？ -很有可能

translation.en: Oh, Nick.
translation.zh: 天啊 尼克

translation.en: It was endearing in the beginning. But now it's just…
translation.zh: 起初我觉得挺可爱的 可是现在…

translation.en: Yeah, I wish he'd be himself. The low-key guy I fell in love with.
translation.zh: 我真希望他能够做自己 做那个我当初爱上的低调男

translation.en: Nick's still that guy.
translation.zh: 尼克没变

translation.en: Weddings make people crazy. I would know, okay?
translation.zh: 婚礼会把人逼疯 我懂 知道吗？

translation.en: Just talk to him. Come here, sit down.
translation.zh: 跟他谈谈就好了 我们坐下

translation.en: [Asha] This is for you.
translation.zh: 这是送给你的

translation.en: Nani gave it to me when I got engaged.
translation.zh: 这是我订婚时奶奶送给我的

translation.en: [Priya] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Asha, are you sure?
translation.zh: 你确定要送给我吗？

translation.en: Yes. [chuckles] Of course.
translation.zh: 十分确定

translation.en: You gonna try it on?
translation.zh: 要不要试试戴上？

translation.en: You guys want some hot samosas?
translation.zh: 吃不吃热腾腾的咖喱角？

translation.en: Asha, Yoshi. Yoshi, Asha.
translation.zh: 艾莎 他是阿良 阿良 她是艾莎

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -Yo, that's your fake girlfriend? Dude! -Shut up.
translation.zh: -她就是你的假女朋友？不错嘛 -少说几句

translation.en: -Sorry! What? -And her sister, Priya.
translation.zh: -对不起 -那是她妹妹普莉雅

translation.en: -Priya. Hi. -I'm engaged.
translation.zh: -普莉雅 你好 -我订婚了

translation.en: -Doesn't change it. -What's with the van?
translation.zh: -不重要 -这货车是怎么回事？

translation.en: -I'm just helping Ravi out with stuff. -Just deliveries. Actually, we gotta go.
translation.zh: -我在帮拉维… -送点东西 我们赶时间

translation.en: Yeah. A busboy got stuck in a walk-in. We have to go save him.
translation.zh: 餐馆勤杂工被困在冷藏间里 我们要去救他出来

translation.en: -Okay. -We just stopped to say hi.
translation.zh: -好吧 -不用再打招呼了

translation.en: -See you at the wedding, yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -婚礼上见？ -好的

translation.en: Nice seeing you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: I… thought he had a start-up.
translation.zh: 他不是初创企业家吗？

translation.en: Maybe they're still… starting up.
translation.zh: 可能公司还停留在初创阶段

translation.en: Ravi!
translation.zh: 拉维！

translation.en: Sorry I'm late.
translation.zh: 对不起 我迟到了

translation.en: Okay, save it. Some auntie thought I was single and put me on coconut duty.
translation.zh: 得了吧 有个阿姨以为我单身 叫我去准备椰子

translation.en: -Aunties. He's with me. We're a couple. -[aunties chuckle]
translation.zh: 嗨 两位阿姨 他是我的男朋友 我们是一对的

translation.en: And here's the thing, Asha.
translation.zh: 艾莎 听好

translation.en: Like, I don't like weddings either. But if you say you're gonna go, I mean, you go.
translation.zh: 我也不喜欢参加婚礼 如果你说你要出席 那就必须出现

translation.en: Okay, understood.
translation.zh: 好的 我懂

translation.en: Look, I'll finish coconut duty.
translation.zh: 我帮你处理椰子吧

translation.en: What is coconut duty?
translation.zh: 怎么处理椰子？

translation.en: All right, give me that.
translation.zh: 行了 给我

translation.en: -Do you need a peeler? -No, you don't.
translation.zh: -需要用上削皮器吗？ -不用

translation.en: Thank you all so much for coming.
translation.zh: 感谢你们出席我的婚礼

translation.en: It's been so, so beautiful to spend the day with you.
translation.zh: 很开心能跟你们一起度过这一天

translation.en: Today isn't about being Hindu or Muslim.
translation.zh: 今天的重点 跟我们是印度人或穆斯林无关

translation.en: It's about being in love.
translation.zh: 而是爱情

translation.en: A love that in the past would have been impossible.
translation.zh: 以前这段爱情是不可能有结果的

translation.en: A love that our…
translation.zh: 这段爱情…

translation.en: …our parents don't support.
translation.zh: 也得不到我们父母的同意

translation.en: But we still love them.
translation.zh: 但我们依然爱他们

translation.en: Lakshmi, you're the love of my life.
translation.zh: 拉克丝米 你是我今生的挚爱

translation.en: Today, tomorrow, always.
translation.zh: 今天、明天 永远都是

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: I can't believe their parents didn't turn up.
translation.zh: 他们父母竟然没来 真是难以置信

translation.en: Well. Your parents, happiness. Your parents, happiness.
translation.zh: 有时候人总要 在父母和幸福之间做出选择

translation.en: -Shouldn't have to be a choice. -That's true.
translation.zh: -这根本不应该是个选择题 -对啊

translation.en: -How's your pitch going? -It's going. Kind of.
translation.zh: -你的推介会准备得怎么样了？ -有进展 算是吧

translation.en: Kind of?
translation.zh: 算是？

translation.en: [sighs] Yeah. Sometimes I feel like I shouldn't have left banking.
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得 我当初不应该离开银行业

translation.en: Come on. You're saving the world, right? One tiny step at a time.
translation.zh: 你可是在拯救世界啊 一步一步来

translation.en: No one said it'd be easy. Besides, there's always second chances.
translation.zh: 拯救世界谈何容易？ 再说 总有第二次机会的

translation.en: Not always.
translation.zh: 不是每次都有第二次机会的

translation.en: Always. I mean, look at them, right?
translation.zh: 总有第二次机会的 你看他们俩

translation.en: They broke up 'cause their parents didn't want them together, but…
translation.zh: 因为父母反对一度分手 可是…

translation.en: -There they are, just going for it. -Hm.
translation.zh: 如今他们义无反顾地结婚了

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: Let's go dance.
translation.zh: 我们一起去跳舞吧

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah. We may never get a second chance.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -对啊 可能以后没有第二次机会了

translation.en: All right. Come on.
translation.zh: 好的 来吧

translation.en: -Wanna go sizzle? -Let's go sizzle.
translation.zh: -想去嗨翻全场吗？ -走吧

translation.en: [whispers] I found it, over.
translation.zh: 我找到了 完毕

translation.en: On my way, over.
translation.zh: 我来了 完毕

translation.en: Oh, wait. Did you find any pics of Dad's Members Only phase?
translation.zh: 等等 你有没有找到 老爸最丑阶段的照片？

translation.en: It ain't a phase if he still wears it. But I did find one with perms, over.
translation.zh: 无论任何年龄阶段 他都戴着眼镜 不过我找到了他顶着蓬蓬头的照片

translation.en: -Ooh! -Check it out.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: Ha! That is definitely going in the slideshow.
translation.zh: 这张一定要放在婚礼视频上

translation.en: Okay. Look at this.
translation.zh: 你看这张

translation.en: That doesn't look fun.
translation.zh: 他们看起来不开心

translation.en: Well, they only knew each other, like, three weeks.
translation.zh: 当时他们才认识了三个星期

translation.en: She must have been so scared.
translation.zh: 她当时肯定很害怕了

translation.en: Have you talked to Nick yet?
translation.zh: 你跟尼克谈过了吗？

translation.en: Uh. I haven't had the heart. He's now taking Bollywood dance lessons.
translation.zh: 我不想伤害他的自尊心 他已经开始上宝莱坞舞蹈课了

translation.en: -Thought you didn't want a dance routine. -I don't. It's way too much pressure.
translation.zh: -你不是不想在婚礼上跳舞吗？ -对啊 压力太大了

translation.en: Okay, Pri, you gotta talk to him.
translation.zh: 普莉雅 你一定要跟他谈谈

translation.en: Do you think Mom had a boyfriend before Dad?
translation.zh: 你说妈妈在认识爸爸前 是不是交过一个男朋友？

translation.en: No. Impossible. He must be a cousin or something.
translation.zh: 不可能 肯定是她表哥什么的

translation.en: Look at your cousin like that?
translation.zh: 你会用这种眼神看着表哥吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but, I mean, Mom would never do something like that.
translation.zh: 不会 但妈妈绝对不会做那种事的

translation.en: Something like what, huh?
translation.zh: 哪种事？

translation.en: What are you two up to?
translation.zh: 你们俩在搞什么鬼？

translation.en: Uh, the wedding slideshow.
translation.zh: 我们在准备婚礼视频

translation.en: Oh. Very exciting. Is Ravi coming for lunch? I'm frying puris.
translation.zh: 真令人期待啊 拉维来吃午饭吗？我在做炸脆饼

translation.en: Oh. Nah.
translation.zh: 不了

translation.en: What nah? When are you going to let us meet him?
translation.zh: 不了？你打算什么时候 带他来见我们？

translation.en: When are you gonna let us meet him?
translation.zh: 对啊 什么时候带他来见我们？

translation.en: We're just not there yet.
translation.zh: 我们还没发展到那个阶段

translation.en: Marriage is a lifetime of getting there. Invite him.
translation.zh: 婚姻是一辈子的事业 邀请他来我们家吃饭

translation.en: Ma, if you push, you know what's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你再逼下去的话 知道会发生什么事了

translation.en: The way to a man's heart is through his stomach.
translation.zh: 要抓住男人的心 就要先抓住他的胃

translation.en: -That is so gross. -Or an angiogram.
translation.zh: -好恶心 -或是通过冠状动脉造影

translation.en: That is also very gross.
translation.zh: 那也很恶心

translation.en: You laugh, but it's the hollow, cynical laugh of the lonely.
translation.zh: 你还笑得出来？ 你的笑声既空洞又虚假

translation.en: That was very harsh.
translation.zh: 说这种话也太无情了

translation.en: Yeah, this is gonna blow up in your face, Ash.
translation.zh: 艾莎 小心自打脸

translation.en: No, it's not. I know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 不会的 我知道自己在做什么

translation.en: Well, I know Mom and Dad. Wait till they get too invested.
translation.zh: 我很了解爸妈 等他们过分投入时 你就完蛋了

translation.en: [whispers] It's just not gonna happen. Over and out.
translation.zh: 我和他是不可能的 通话结束

translation.en: So, Veena, Dinesh. We may have another wedding in our future.
translation.zh: 薇娜、迪内什 我们家可能很快就要办喜事了

translation.en: Pooja Patel heard from Pinky that they went straight from fizzle to sizzle.
translation.zh: 普佳·帕特尔听红姨说 他们俩的爱情起死回生了

translation.en: -So let's start planning a date! -What?
translation.zh: -我们可以开始挑个良辰吉日了 -什么？

translation.en: [Veena] I told you!
translation.zh: 我都说了

translation.en: Oh, after all these years of hoping, planning, praying, finally!
translation.zh: 这些年来 我们怀抱希望 不断筹备、不住祈祷 终于有结果了

translation.en: Let's not get ahead of ourselves. Pooja is a number one rascal.
translation.zh: 先别高兴得太早 普佳是个大话精

translation.en: I just know my Ravi's happier than he's ever been. I told him, "Just meet Asha."
translation.zh: 我发现我家拉维比以前更开心了 我都跟他说了 我叫他去跟艾莎见面

translation.en: "She's such a good girl. What's the harm?" Now, see?
translation.zh: 她是个好女孩 见个面又何妨？ 如今你们看吧

translation.en: They think our way of doing things is old-fashioned and silly.
translation.zh: 他们年轻人老是觉得 我们老人家做事手法老土和不切实际

translation.en: Asha says our thinking is stuck in the India of 40 years ago.
translation.zh: 艾莎老是说我们的思想 停留在四十年前的印度

translation.en: But Asha became an economist like her old man. That's something.
translation.zh: 但艾莎不也像她爸一样 成为经济学家吗？ 这很了不起

translation.en: But she's too idealistic.
translation.zh: 只是她太不切实际了

translation.en: I admire you, Dinesh.
translation.zh: 我倒是羡慕你 迪内什

translation.en: Running this restaurant, putting Ravi through college.
translation.zh: 经营这家餐厅 供拉维上大学

translation.en: It's no small feat.
translation.zh: 这可是很大的成就

translation.en: I wanted more than this for him. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 但我觉得他还不够好

translation.en: So tell us more about Ravi's company.
translation.zh: 说说拉维经营的公司吧

translation.en: You know these start-ups, huh? So secretive.
translation.zh: 你们也懂初创公司的作风了 神神秘秘的

translation.en: -[Suneeta chuckles] -Who knows what he does.
translation.zh: 谁晓得他在做什么

translation.en: Say no more. Asha doesn't want to tell us anything about her new job either.
translation.zh: 可不是吗？艾莎也不想跟我们透露 任何她工作上的事

translation.en: To our kids who think their parents know nothing.
translation.zh: 为两个以为我们一无所知的孩子干杯

translation.en: What would they do without us, huh?
translation.zh: 没有我们 他们能够成功吗？

translation.en: -Cheers! -Cheers!
translation.zh: -干杯！ -干杯！

translation.en: -They'd be penniless. -And barren.
translation.zh: -他们一毛钱也没有 -也不会有孩子

translation.en: [Tina] Okay, listen to this one.
translation.zh: 听听这个案例

translation.en: Her alcoholic husband walked out right after their son was born.
translation.zh: 自从儿子出世后 她喝酒成性的丈夫就弃他们而去

translation.en: So then we gave her a loan to open a tea shop.
translation.zh: 于是我们为她提供贷款 让她可以开一家茶馆

translation.en: Her son became the first in her family to go to high school.
translation.zh: 后来她儿子成了 她家族里第一个考上高中的人

translation.en: Yeah, you know what this means? These loans were her lucky break.
translation.zh: -知道这意味着什么吗？ -这项贷款改善了她的境遇

translation.en: Now that's a story to believe in.
translation.zh: 这是一个很有说服力的故事

translation.en: What are you all smiley, smiley about?
translation.zh: 你笑什么？

translation.en: -The suits are coming back. -Singapore?
translation.zh: -那几个大客户会再回来 -你是指新加坡客户？

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: -In a few weeks. -No!
translation.zh: -就在几个星期后 -不会吧？

translation.en: Okay, just… I gotta get to work then.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要忙起来了

translation.en: Exactly. But not here.
translation.zh: 没错 但不是在办公室里

translation.en: One of our big donors is having a soiree and you're going to be my wingwoman.
translation.zh: 今晚有一场赞助商办的晚宴 我要你当我的女伴

translation.en: That is if you don't have another wedding.
translation.zh: 但前提是你今晚不用出席婚礼

translation.en: Oh, I did, but I told Ravi I have a sinus infection, so…
translation.zh: 我确实有一场婚礼 但我已经跟拉维说我鼻窦炎发作了

translation.en: Oh, that's a great plan. Fake being sick to fake out your fake boyfriend.
translation.zh: 这个做法不错嘛 跟你的假男友装病

translation.en: Ever thought of getting out of this racket and going back to London?
translation.zh: 你有没有想过逃出这个局 回去伦敦发展？

translation.en: I hadn't until recently.
translation.zh: 我刚萌生了这个想法

translation.en: The head of our Southeast Asia division just quit.
translation.zh: 东南亚分行总经理刚辞职了

translation.en: -Couldn't handle the poverty. -Would you take that job?
translation.zh: -他受不了穷人 -你怎么不接手呢？

translation.en: In a New York minute.
translation.zh: 十分乐意

translation.en: But it must be earned, love. Hence, the return of Singapore.
translation.zh: 但那个职位是要争取的 所以要看新加坡客户的意愿了

translation.en: No pressure there.
translation.zh: 别给自己太大的压力

translation.en: Look, I should go back to the office--
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 我还是回去办公室吧

translation.en: -Desert me and you're fired. -Okay.
translation.zh: -你敢抛下我 我就开除你 -好吧

translation.en: Now, come on. Let's enjoy this bargain drink,
translation.zh: 别愁眉苦脸的 好好享受这杯便宜的酒

translation.en: this impossibly hip DJ, and whatever it is hanging in this room.
translation.zh: 这个超潮的DJ放的音乐 以及挂在宴会现场墙上的东西

translation.en: Hey, do you think that DJ would do Priya's wedding?
translation.zh: 你说这位DJ 愿意在普莉雅的婚礼上打碟吗？

translation.en: Maybe you should go check. And look out for donors on the way.
translation.zh: 你可以去问问他 顺便看看有没有合适的赞助商

translation.en: Copy that.
translation.zh: 收到

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Mr. DJ?
translation.zh: DJ先生！

translation.en: Um, I'm sorry to interrupt your set, and I don't want to cause offense.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰你工作 希望你不会介意

translation.en: But is there any chance that you do weddings at all?
translation.zh: 你平常有没有在婚礼上演出？

translation.en: Uh, actually, someone's booked me solid on the Indian wedding circuit.
translation.zh: 我已经跟某人说好 陪她参加印度婚礼巡演了

translation.en: [Asha] Ravi?
translation.zh: 拉维？

translation.en: Sinus infection cleared up?
translation.zh: 你的鼻窦炎好了？

translation.en: Um, well, NyQuil.
translation.zh: 我吃了感冒药

translation.en: -So you're-- -Spellbound. Am I right?
translation.zh: -原来你就是… -DJ拼魔 对吧？

translation.en: -Ravi, this is my boss… -James?
translation.zh: -拉维 这位是我的上司… -詹姆斯 对吧？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Yes.
translation.zh: 不错嘛

translation.en: You'd think they'd have nicer cheese at a fancy gig like this.
translation.zh: 这么高级的晚宴 还以为主办方会提供更好吃的奶酪

translation.en: That's butter, dude.
translation.zh: 老兄 那是黄油

translation.en: How do you both know each other?
translation.zh: 你们是怎么认识的？

translation.en: I heard him play a few sets at a club in Ibiza back in my party boy days.
translation.zh: 我年少轻狂的时候 曾经在伊维萨岛听过他打碟好几次

translation.en: He brought the house down.
translation.zh: 他燃爆了整场派对

translation.en: -[Ravi and James chuckle] -Clearly.
translation.zh: 看得出来

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 不错嘛

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna go schmooze.
translation.zh: 我要去应酬了

translation.en: -I'm gonna-- -Not you.
translation.zh: -那我就… -你不行

translation.en: Enjoy the butter.
translation.zh: 好好享用这些黄油

translation.en: Thanks, buddy.
translation.zh: 谢了 老兄

translation.en: You want to grab some air?
translation.zh: 要出去喘口气吗？

translation.en: Yeah, uh, I could do air.
translation.zh: 好啊 我不介意出去喘口气

translation.en: Air is good.
translation.zh: 外面空气新鲜嘛

translation.en: Keep it chill. No lasers.
translation.zh: 继续放些轻松的音乐 别开激光

translation.en: -Have a little faith, Rav. -I have no faith.
translation.zh: -相信我吧 -我信不过你

translation.en: Nice to see you, Yoshi.
translation.zh: 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: Nice to see you too. Is your sister still engaged?
translation.zh: 我也是 你妹妹跟未婚夫分手了吗？

translation.en: [Asha] Yes, she is.
translation.zh: 他们还在一起

translation.en: [Yoshi] All right, cool.
translation.zh: 好吧 不要紧的

translation.en: How's everyone doing? All right.
translation.zh: 大家好吗？来吧

translation.en: DJ Spellbound's a little busy, so Yoshi's in the house.
translation.zh: DJ拼魔有点忙过不来 从现在起 阿良当家！

translation.en: -So, DJ Spellbound, huh? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你是DJ拼魔？

translation.en: -That's not ironic at all. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 还真贴切啊

translation.en: You know, it started as joke, but, um, kinda just stuck.
translation.zh: 起初只是个玩笑 然后就固定下来了

translation.en: So, um, what's your big secret? Why don't you have a real boyfriend?
translation.zh: 聊聊你最大的秘密吧 为什么不交个真正的男朋友？

translation.en: Why don't I have a real boyfriend?
translation.zh: 为什么不交个真正的男朋友？

translation.en: I think it's a legit question here.
translation.zh: 我觉得这是一个合理的问题

translation.en: Okay, yeah. It is.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: After things ended with Krish, I figured why stop there?
translation.zh: 我和克里什分手后 我心想没必要原地打转

translation.en: So I quit my job, moved to Jersey in the hope of starting over in many ways.
translation.zh: 于是我辞去原来的工作 搬到新泽西州 希望在各个方面展开新生活

translation.en: Of course, my mom thinks I quit banking just to spite her.
translation.zh: 我妈自然会觉得 我辞掉银行的工作是为了气她

translation.en: -Did you? -Probably.
translation.zh: -难道不是吗？ -可能是吧

translation.en: So what about you? DJ… ing, how did that happen?
translation.zh: 那你呢？为什么会跑去打碟？ 当初怎么会有这个想法？

translation.en: You know, my backup skill set is spelling incredibly esoteric words.
translation.zh: 我用来应急的技术 只有拼写很少人懂的英文单词

translation.en: Can't really make a living off that.
translation.zh: 这种技术赚不到钱吧

translation.en: -Logorrhea. I mean… -Logorrhea.
translation.zh: -语泻 对吗？ -可不是吗？

translation.en: But no, like, when I was a kid, everything I did was for my parents.
translation.zh: 其实我小时候 所做的一切都是为了讨好父母

translation.en: Right? Everything. Except music. Music was for me.
translation.zh: 对吧？除了音乐之外 音乐我是为自己做的

translation.en: I mean, music used to make me happy.
translation.zh: 音乐一直是我的快乐泉源

translation.en: But, uh, lately, I don't know. I mean…
translation.zh: 只是最近 不知道怎么的

translation.en: I've been on the road for, like, ten years just working nonstop.
translation.zh: 过去十年以来 我马不停蹄地工作

translation.en: I don't know what I'm working for anymore.
translation.zh: 连为什么要工作也不知道了

translation.en: I figured I'd take a break, just come back home and fix my family.
translation.zh: 我想休息一下 回家跟家人联络感情

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's kind of complicated.
translation.zh: 不好意思 事情有点复杂

translation.en: Damn it, Yoshi.
translation.zh: 该死的 是阿良！

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I gotta… -Yeah, you gotta go.
translation.zh: -对不起 我要… -你还是过去吧

translation.en: -DJ stuff. -Yeah, I gotta… Right.
translation.zh: -你要去打碟了 -是啊 我要去…没错

translation.en: Are we good?
translation.zh: 我们还好吧？

translation.en: We're good. We're cool. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我们很好 没什么

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: Yoshi!
translation.zh: 阿良！

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I can't believe he's Spellbound.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信他就是DJ拼魔

translation.en: [Asha] Wait, you actually know who he is?
translation.zh: 等等 你知道“DJ拼魔”这号人物？

translation.en: I don't, I'm a nerd, but he's got like a gazillion followers.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我是个宅女 只知道他有一大堆粉丝

translation.en: I do not trust DJs.
translation.zh: 我信不过DJ

translation.en: -[Asha chuckles] -Why? What's wrong with DJs?
translation.zh: 为什么？DJ怎么了？

translation.en: I'm sure they're talented. I don't understand what they do,
translation.zh: 他们很有才华 只是我不理解他们的工作

translation.en: so don't respect it.
translation.zh: 所以他们得不到我的尊重 他在隐瞒什么？

translation.en: -What's he hiding? -I don't think he's hiding anything.
translation.zh: 所以他们得不到我的尊重 他在隐瞒什么？ 我不觉得他有所隐瞒 只是他从没提过自己的过去

translation.en: It just never came up.
translation.zh: 我不觉得他有所隐瞒 只是他从没提过自己的过去

translation.en: You've been to a bazillion weddings and never asked him about his background?
translation.zh: 你们一起参加过这么多场婚礼 却没问过他的背景？

translation.en: I… I didn't want him to get the wrong idea.
translation.zh: 我不要他误会

translation.en: Ash, what if it's not the wrong idea?
translation.zh: 艾莎 万一他就是那个对的人呢？

translation.en: Priya, have you been talking to Mom again?
translation.zh: 普莉雅 你最近是不是经常 跟妈妈聊天？

translation.en: Let it happen. You want it, sis.
translation.zh: 大姐 你就顺其自然吧 你明明就喜欢人家

translation.en: -Shh! -[Priya] But--
translation.zh: -闭嘴！ -只是…

translation.en: What you want…
translation.zh: 你需要的是…

translation.en: is a Mumbai Monster.
translation.zh: 一杯“孟买怪兽”

translation.en: A Mumbai Monster.
translation.zh: 好一杯“孟买怪兽”

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 里面有什么？

translation.en: It's a masala mojito infused with cumin seeds and Kashmiri chilies.
translation.zh: 是一种印度香料鸡尾酒 含有枯茗籽和克什米尔辣椒粉

translation.en: It is…
translation.zh: 味道…

translation.en: That good, huh?
translation.zh: 有那么好喝吗？

translation.en: Oh my God. That's disgusting.
translation.zh: 天啊 好恶心

translation.en: So what do we know about him?
translation.zh: 说说我们对他了解多少

translation.en: Okay, he was born in Jersey City and he graduated MIT 2011.
translation.zh: 他出生于泽西市 2011年毕业于麻省理工学院

translation.en: My pal Joby graduated in 2010. I can see what I can find out.
translation.zh: 我的好兄弟乔比是2010届毕业生 看看我能从他那边探听到什么

translation.en: No, we're not snooping on Ravi.
translation.zh: 不要 别去打探拉维的底细

translation.en: [Nick] It's not snooping.
translation.zh: 这不叫打探底细

translation.en: I'm collecting information about him without him knowing.
translation.zh: 我只是悄悄地收集他的情报

translation.en: If he is gonna join our family, we got to find out who he really is.
translation.zh: 如果他以后会成为我们的家人 我们就有必要给他起底

translation.en: He's not joining our family, guys, okay? We're just--
translation.zh: 他不会成为我们的家人 知道吗？

translation.en: You're just more than fake dating.
translation.zh: 你们的关系已经超出假约会的范围了

translation.en: You like him, admit it.
translation.zh: 你喜欢他 认了吧

translation.en: So Nick, how's the, um… How's the Hindi coming along?
translation.zh: 尼克 你的印度语学到什么程度了？

translation.en: [in Hindi] The bride is driving pickles around.
translation.zh: 新娘在运送腌菜

translation.en: [in English] He's very good.
translation.zh: 他挺厉害的

translation.en: I said, "It's going great." Right?
translation.zh: 我说的是“很顺利” 对吧？

translation.en: Pretty much.
translation.zh: 差不多

translation.en: Hey, babe. Maybe you don't need to try so hard to impress Mom and Dad.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你没必要很刻意地去讨好我父母

translation.en: Yes, I do. I do.
translation.zh: 怎么会没必要呢？

translation.en: Nick, you're a neurosurgeon.
translation.zh: 尼克 你是一个神经外科医生

translation.en: Here's the thing.
translation.zh: 你们听我说

translation.en: A binary craniotomy is nothing compared to planning an Indian wedding.
translation.zh: 比起筹备一场印度婚礼 开颅手术根本不算什么

translation.en: And I really want this to go well.
translation.zh: 我真的很希望我们的婚礼不会出差错

translation.en: My parents were barely married seven years.
translation.zh: 我父母结婚七年后就离婚了

translation.en: In Indian traditions, the souls are linked for seven lifetimes.
translation.zh: 在印度传统中 夫妻七生七世永不分离

translation.en: Wow, that's a long time, babe.
translation.zh: 天啊 好长啊

translation.en: It's not nearly enough, pumpkin.
translation.zh: 我还嫌不够呢 亲爱的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 行了

translation.en: [Asha] I am starving!
translation.zh: 我快饿坏了

translation.en: [Ravi] Me too. Who runs out of food at a wedding? Come on!
translation.zh: 我也是 哪有人办婚礼伙食不够的？

translation.en: [Asha] There wasn't even a garlic naan in sight. Whoa!
translation.zh: 连大蒜烤饼都没了 天啊

translation.en: Holy crap, Ravi.
translation.zh: 我的妈啊 拉维

translation.en: You live here by yourself?
translation.zh: 你一个人住在这里吗？

translation.en: When I'm not traveling, yeah. I don't get to spend much time here, so…
translation.zh: 没出门的时候就住在这里 我很少待在家里 所以…

translation.en: It's kind of nice, being at home. Though I did have fun on the road.
translation.zh: 待在家里挺舒服的 但我也很喜欢出门旅行

translation.en: [Asha] Yeah, I can see that.
translation.zh: 是啊 看得出来

translation.en: Anyway, you didn't finish your story. So you moved to Jersey… [Asha] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 对了 你的故事还没说完呢 你说后来你搬到新泽西州

translation.en: Now what?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: -Now I change the world. -[Ravi chuckles]
translation.zh: 然后我开始改变世界

translation.en: No, but seriously, starting this fund up has been way harder than I expected.
translation.zh: 说真的 发起这项基金 比我想象中还要困难

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you know, anything worth doing is hard, right?
translation.zh: 值得做的事都很难 不是吗？

translation.en: I remember when I first started DJing
translation.zh: 记得我开始打碟不久后

translation.en: my parents threatened to stop paying for MIT. It was scary.
translation.zh: 我父母威胁我 要断了我的学费 吓死我了

translation.en: So what did you do?
translation.zh: 那你怎么反应？

translation.en: I knew exactly what to do. I panicked.
translation.zh: 我很清楚要怎么反应 我紧张死了

translation.en: Parents, happiness. Happiness, parents.
translation.zh: 总要在父母和幸福之间做出选择

translation.en: Yeah. Here's to not letting them drown that inner voice.
translation.zh: 为我们内在的声音 没被父母淹没而干杯

translation.en: Although, you know what my inner voice is saying right now?
translation.zh: 你知道我内在的声音在说什么吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 说什么？

translation.en: Yo quiero Taco Bell.
translation.zh: 我好想吃塔可钟

translation.en: -Oh my God. -I need Taco Bell.
translation.zh: -天啊 -我好想吃塔可钟

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, every Indian loves Taco Bell.
translation.zh: 好吧 印度人都爱吃塔可钟

translation.en: -[phone chimes] -Give me a sec.
translation.zh: 失陪一下

translation.en: -Where are the plates? -Uh, second cabinet.
translation.zh: -盘子在哪里？ -第二个柜子里

translation.en: [Asha] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Yoshi. Um, Good Samaritan needs, like, 27 number eights.
translation.zh: 阿良 好撒马利亚人需要27份8号盒饭

translation.en: Yeah. Patesh will meet you out back. And don't forget the mango pickle.
translation.zh: 帕特什会在后巷跟你会合 别忘了带走腌芒果

translation.en: Yeah, and do not be seen again.
translation.zh: 别再被发现了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: It's okay. Um…
translation.zh: 不要紧的

translation.en: Yoshi works at your parents' restaurant?
translation.zh: 阿良在你父母的餐厅打工吗？

translation.en: Not exactly. You know, he just picks up stuff sometimes.
translation.zh: 不完全是 他只是去搬东西

translation.en: Uh-huh. And then he sends them to food banks.
translation.zh: 是吗？接着把东西送到食物银行

translation.en: Sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候

translation.en: [whispers] Sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候？

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 到底怎么回事？

translation.en: All right. Uh, I've been making these huge catering orders from Aroma
translation.zh: 好吧 我会定时向印度风味餐厅订餐

translation.en: and giving them to homeless shelters, food banks, Little League teams. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 然后送去收容中心 食物银行和少年棒球联盟

translation.en: Okay, but why through Yoshi?
translation.zh: 为什么非要阿良去应接？

translation.en: My dad doesn't know.
translation.zh: 我爸不知情

translation.en: You're doing this behind his back. That just feels wrong.
translation.zh: 你瞒着他去做这件事 这样不对吧？

translation.en: The restaurant is struggling, you know? And he's a stubborn man.
translation.zh: 餐厅生意不太好 加上他是个顽固的老家伙

translation.en: Yeah, anyway. Let's eat.
translation.zh: 别说了 开动吧

translation.en: -I just have one question for you. -Hmm?
translation.zh: -我还有一个问题想问你 -问吧

translation.en: Would you like some mango pickle with your quesalupa?
translation.zh: 想不想在你的“杂交塔可”中 加上腌芒果？

translation.en: You talking dirty to me?
translation.zh: 这是性暗示吗？

translation.en: I am stuffed.
translation.zh: 我吃得好饱

translation.en: There's another quesalupa with your name on it.
translation.zh: 那边有个“杂交塔可”是留给你的

translation.en: No mas for me.
translation.zh: 我吃不下去了

translation.en: Shh.
translation.zh: 别说话

translation.en: Listen.
translation.zh: 你听

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 什么声音？

translation.en: The sound of no aunties.
translation.zh: 没有三姑六婆的声音

translation.en: No Yoshi.
translation.zh: 没有阿良的声音

translation.en: -No parents. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -没有父母的声音 -没错

translation.en: Nobody left to fool.
translation.zh: 那就没必要演戏了

translation.en: I could be making a big mistake hanging out with, like, this cool DJ,
translation.zh: 跟一个擅长选音乐 掌控气氛、打碟的帅气DJ单独相处

translation.en: who, like, drops beats, turns tables, scratches things.
translation.zh: 跟一个擅长选音乐 掌控气氛、打碟的帅气DJ单独相处 很可能是个大错

translation.en: Yeah, that's me.
translation.zh: 你指的那个人就是我

translation.en: I talk a lot when nervous. It's called logorrhea.
translation.zh: 我紧张的时候会说个不停 这种病叫“语泻”

translation.en: -You might've heard of it. -Right.
translation.zh: -你可能听过这个词 -是的

translation.en: It's… It's this really long word. I don't know how to spell it…
translation.zh: 这个单词太长了 我都不会拼…

translation.en: Did you just kiss me?
translation.zh: 你刚刚吻了我吗？

translation.en: Looked like you could use a kiss.
translation.zh: 你看起来很需要被吻

translation.en: Are we still role-playing?
translation.zh: 我们还在演戏吗？

translation.en: We're improvising.
translation.zh: 这叫即兴发挥

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [scoffs] And I'm boring you. Wow.
translation.zh: 我竟然让你闷透了 天啊

translation.en: Sorry. It's not you.
translation.zh: 不好意思 不是你的错

translation.en: -Uh-huh. It's the music, right? -Mm-mm.
translation.zh: -是音乐的错吧？ -不是

translation.en: Yeah, better be the music.
translation.zh: 最好是音乐的问题

translation.en: -What does a DJ actually do? -I like to think I make people happy.
translation.zh: -DJ究竟是怎么样的职业？ -我认为是给人带来欢乐

translation.en: Make people happy?
translation.zh: 给人带来欢乐？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. I connect with people. I can feel their energy, you know?
translation.zh: 没错 我的工作是与人交流 我可以感受到他们的能量

translation.en: [Ravi] I can tell when their moods are shifting. I can build on it.
translation.zh: 可以感受到他们的心情变了 按照他们的心情选音乐

translation.en: Music's just something that brings people together, you know?
translation.zh: 音乐是一股将人团结在一起的力量

translation.en: I just love being a part of it. When I was a kid, I used to feel so lost…
translation.zh: 我喜欢沉浸在音乐中 我小时候总是觉得没有方向

translation.en: [Ravi] Asha?
translation.zh: 艾莎？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Nice moves.
translation.zh: 动作不错嘛

translation.en: -Hey! [chuckles] -Hey.
translation.zh: -嗨 -嗨

translation.en: -Good morning. -Good morning.
translation.zh: -早安 -早安

translation.en: -How are you feeling? -Great.
translation.zh: -睡得好吗？ -很好

translation.en: -I haven't slept that well in a long time. -Yeah, I noticed.
translation.zh: -我好久没睡那么久了 -看得出来

translation.en: Hey, Ravi, about last night. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 拉维 我想就昨晚的事向你道歉

translation.en: You're sorry.
translation.zh: 你向我道歉？

translation.en: Yeah, that should never have happened.
translation.zh: 对啊 那种事不应该发生

translation.en: Right. No, you know, it's probably my fault.
translation.zh: 对啊 不是 也可能是我的错

translation.en: I should apologize. I shouldn't have had you here.
translation.zh: 该道歉的人是我 我不应该邀请你到我家的

translation.en: -No, Ravi-- -No, I get it. We had a deal.
translation.zh: -不是的 拉维 -我懂 我们说好的

translation.en: No, Ravi.
translation.zh: 不是的 拉维

translation.en: I mean that I'm sorry that I fell asleep.
translation.zh: 我是指昨晚说着说着我就睡着了 我要就这件事向你道歉

translation.en: I wish I hadn't. I was having a really nice time.
translation.zh: 我真希望我没睡着 我昨晚过得很开心

translation.en: -Yeah? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -真的

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: But maybe we can just keep this to ourselves for a little while.
translation.zh: 但我们还是暂时别公开好了

translation.en: You want to fake that we're fake dating?
translation.zh: 你要我们假装假约会？

translation.en: I don't want things to get weird.
translation.zh: 我不想把事情复杂化

translation.en: Can we at least agree we like each other or…
translation.zh: 起码我们应该承认 我们是喜欢彼此的吧？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我也说不上来

translation.en: -I'll take that as a yes. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -我就当你承认了 -好的

translation.en: Though no one can know we really like each other.
translation.zh: 却不能让别人知道 我们是真心喜欢彼此的

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -[Ravi] Are you a dancer? -[Asha] Used to be.
translation.zh: -你会跳舞？ -以前会

translation.en: ♪ We're getting closer But we're trying to be friends ♪
translation.zh: （说唱风格 节奏 能量 天马行空）

translation.en: ♪ If we start it might never end So we keep tiptoeing ♪
translation.zh: （财务 父母 投资 父权制）

translation.en: ♪ So much at risk And I am scared to lose ♪
translation.zh: （拉维山卡）

translation.en: -I gotta check that. Sorry. -No, you don't.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我得查看这条短信 -不用道歉

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, no, no, no. -What?
translation.zh: -糟糕 -怎么了？

translation.en: It's James. Singapore's coming back. They're gonna be here in nine hours.
translation.zh: 是詹姆斯 他说新加坡客户来了 九小时后抵达公司

translation.en: On a Sunday?
translation.zh: 今天可是星期天

translation.en: Yeah. I'm not ready. I dropped the ball. I have five years of stories left.
translation.zh: 对啊 我还没准备好 我失败过一次了 我还有五年的故事还没看好

translation.en: Asha, I've seen you bust your ass all summer
translation.zh: 艾莎 整个夏天下来 我看你忙得焦头烂额

translation.en: going through these boxes looking for this story to believe in.
translation.zh: 从这些箱子里寻找值得相信的故事

translation.en: I don't wanna overstep, but I don't think you'll find that story in a box.
translation.zh: 不是我多事 但我认为箱子里没有你要找的故事

translation.en: What does that mean?
translation.zh: 怎么说？

translation.en: You're the story. Okay?
translation.zh: 你就是那个故事 知道吗？

translation.en: For what it's worth, I believe in that story like I believe in you.
translation.zh: 不管说这个有没有用 我相信那个故事 就如我相信你一样

translation.en: They'll believe in you.
translation.zh: 他们一定会相信你的

translation.en: I'm scared, Ravi.
translation.zh: 拉维 我很害怕

translation.en: Everybody's scared.
translation.zh: 每个人都会害怕

translation.en: But you've done the hard work already, right?
translation.zh: 你已经尽最大的能力了

translation.en: Now you just gotta own what you want, listen to your heart,
translation.zh: 如今你只需要接纳自己想要什么 倾听内心的声音

translation.en: and just let your love be greater than your fear.
translation.zh: 用爱战胜恐惧

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: You got this.
translation.zh: 你可以的

translation.en: Ready to clean out the bank of Singapore?
translation.zh: 准备好清空新加坡的银行了吗？

translation.en: Beat you to it.
translation.zh: 比你早先一步了

translation.en: Excuse me. You're making progress.
translation.zh: 恕我直言 你进步了

translation.en: Now, get changed, and let's go knock their Gucci socks off.
translation.zh: 去换件衣服 让他们大开眼界

translation.en: I am changed.
translation.zh: 我已经换好衣服了

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: You sure?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 确定

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: When I was three years old,
translation.zh: 我三岁那年

translation.en: I shocked my parents by calculating a 12% tip on a pizza delivery.
translation.zh: 父母对我算出 披萨外送服务12%的小费感到震惊

translation.en: Numbers've never failed me.
translation.zh: 数字从没让我失望过

translation.en: But today, I am not here to talk about numbers.
translation.zh: 今天我要说的不是数字

translation.en: I'm here to talk about her.
translation.zh: 我要说的是她

translation.en: When we gave Chinda a loan to open her tailor shop,
translation.zh: 当年我们为欣达提供开裁缝店的贷款

translation.en: we gave her a new life.
translation.zh: 也给了她崭新的人生

translation.en: We also gave her daughters the ability to become the first in their family to attend high school.
translation.zh: 我们还让她几个女儿 成为家族里第一批上高中的人

translation.en: Like Chinda, my grandfather… my dada-ji, also received a loan.
translation.zh: 我爷爷的情况跟欣达一样 当年他也是贷款项目的受益人

translation.en: When floods destroyed his crops in the small town called Mirzapur,
translation.zh: 当年在米尔扎布尔镇 水灾将他的农作物都毁了

translation.en: he moved to Mumbai and borrowed 1000 rupees to buy this boat.
translation.zh: 于是他搬到孟买 借了1000卢比买下这艘船

translation.en: With the money that he made fishing,
translation.zh: 他用打鱼挣来的钱

translation.en: he was able to send my father to Ohio State to study economics,
translation.zh: 把我爸送到俄亥俄州学习经济学

translation.en: making my dad the first in our family to finish college.
translation.zh: 使我爸成为家族里 第一个大学毕业的成员

translation.en: I am standing in this room today because of this boat
translation.zh: 今天我会站在这个房间里 就是因为这艘船

translation.en: and because of the sacrifices that my parents made
translation.zh: 以及父母所做出的牺牲

translation.en: to make sure their children had a better life.
translation.zh: 他们要确保孩子们过上更美好的人生

translation.en: Our story is a reminder
translation.zh: 我们的故事提醒大家

translation.en: that these loans aren't just a chance to change a woman's life,
translation.zh: 这些贷款项目 不仅能够改变一个女人的人生

translation.en: but the chance to change her entire family's future.
translation.zh: 也能够改变她所有家人的未来

translation.en: Across continents,
translation.zh: 跨越海洋

translation.en: for generations to come.
translation.zh: 世代传承

translation.en: And if we're being honest,
translation.zh: 说真的

translation.en: our lives are better when their lives are better.
translation.zh: 唯有下一代幸福了 我们才会幸福

translation.en: Or as my father would say,
translation.zh: 就像我父亲以前常说的一句话

translation.en: "A rising tide lifts all boats."
translation.zh: 一朝水涨 众船皆高

translation.en: That's the real story here.
translation.zh: 这是真人真事

translation.en: The question is, how many stories are we willing to rewrite?
translation.zh: 问题是 我们愿意再创造 多少个类似的故事？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Hey yourself.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: How can you afford to buy so many of these?
translation.zh: 你怎么有钱买这么多杯咖啡？

translation.en: I'm hopelessly addicted to caffeine and prefer not to drink alone.
translation.zh: 我对咖啡已经无可救药地上瘾 所以我不想一个人喝

translation.en: Enjoy it while you can.
translation.zh: 趁还有机会 好好享受吧

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.zh: 等等 什么意思？

translation.en: Unfortunately, I won't be able to keep you here.
translation.zh: 很遗憾地告诉你 我留不下你了

translation.en: James, I thought we--
translation.zh: 我以为我们…

translation.en: You convinced them to invest an additional ten million beyond our ask.
translation.zh: 你说服了客户在原有的资金额上 加码了一千万美元

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Oh my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: And you're firing me?
translation.zh: 你却要开除我？

translation.en: Hardly. When I told London the good news,
translation.zh: 怎么可能？ 我把这个好消息告诉伦敦的高层后

translation.en: they decided to offer the Southeast Asia division to you.
translation.zh: 他们决定 将东南亚分行总经理的位置交给你

translation.en: But that's your promotion.
translation.zh: 那可是你升迁的机会啊

translation.en: [scoffs] London can wait. And let's be honest, I couldn't do half the job you will.
translation.zh: 伦敦可以等 老实说 我也没有你一半的实力

translation.en: No, no, no. I can't accept that.
translation.zh: 不对 不行 我不能接受

translation.en: You don't have a choice.
translation.zh: 你别无选择

translation.en: Now, not only did Singapore come through,
translation.zh: 如今不仅新加坡贷款项目定案了

translation.en: but we received an additional massive donation from Red Star
translation.zh: 我们还收到了 红星拉萨基金会的大笔捐款

translation.en: that really got London's attention.
translation.zh: 引起了伦敦高层的高度关注

translation.en: All because of you.
