translation.zh: 全都是你的功劳

translation.en: -Red Star? -Another charitable trust.
translation.zh: -红星拉萨基金会？ -另一个慈善基金会

translation.en: Ash, when it rains it pours, and our little tin cup runneth over. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 艾莎 这叫低开高走 福杯满溢

translation.en: It's beautiful, isn't it?
translation.zh: 很漂亮吧？

translation.en: Yes. It is.
translation.zh: 对啊 没错

translation.en: Congratulations, Ash.
translation.zh: 恭喜你 艾莎

translation.en: Now I have to go figure out how to spend all this money. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 现在我要去想想 该怎么使用这一大笔钱了

translation.en: James.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: It was just coffee.
translation.zh: 不过是一杯咖啡

translation.en: Priya! Tea's ready. And your phone is dinging.
translation.zh: 普莉雅 茶泡好了 你的手机响了

translation.en: Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Okay. Okay. Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: What else could, "I have big news to share," mean, hey?
translation.zh: 她写道“有大好消息要告诉你” 还会有什么事呢？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Yeah. Okay, okay. Listen, listen.
translation.zh: 好的 你听我说

translation.en: Why don't you come for Sunday lunch, hmm?
translation.zh: 不如星期天到我们家 一起吃顿午饭吧？

translation.en: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah. Absolutely.
translation.zh: 好啊 没问题

translation.en: Yeah, do wear a sari.
translation.zh: 一定要穿纱丽

translation.en: Okay. And I've already arranged mithai.
translation.zh: 好的 糕点我都打点好了

translation.en: Okay, okay. All right. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 好的 到时见

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Thank you. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你 感激不尽

translation.en: What's the occasion?
translation.zh: 什么大日子？

translation.en: Just the Shahs coming for lunch.
translation.zh: 没什么 只是萨家要到我家来吃午饭

translation.en: Accha! Things getting serious, huh?
translation.zh: 看来他们是认真的 对吧？

translation.en: Hmm, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: A word to the wise.
translation.zh: 明白人不用细说

translation.en: Don't blindly trust what Ravi's parents say about him.
translation.zh: 别盲目地相信 拉维的父母对他们儿子的评价

translation.en: Fine, theek hai.
translation.zh: 好的 知道了

translation.en: Arre, listen.
translation.zh: 你听我说

translation.en: Just do a background check. You know, college, job, horoscope--
translation.zh: 我劝你还是做个背景调查吧 大学、工作、生辰八字什么的

translation.en: Ravi graduated from MIT, for God's sake.
translation.zh: 拉维毕业于麻省理工学院 你有完没完？

translation.en: -Suneeta, listen. -And he makes my Asha happy.
translation.zh: -苏妮塔 你听我说 -最重要的是 他能给我家艾莎幸福

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 糕点来了

translation.en: Everybody, come. Line up. We'll do the photo.
translation.zh: 大家都过来 排排站 拍张合影

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Coming. Coming!
translation.zh: 知道了 来了

translation.en: -[Suneeta] Come here. -[Vijay] Come on.
translation.zh: -快过来 -快点

translation.en: [Dinesh] Come, Veena. Okay.
translation.zh: 来吧 薇娜 好了

translation.en: -One, two, three. Say paneer. -[camera beeping]
translation.zh: 一、二、三 笑一个！

translation.en: [all] Paneer!
translation.zh: 笑一个！

translation.en: I can't wait to see their faces!
translation.zh: 我等不及看到他们的表情了

translation.en: -Oh, I hear the door. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我去开门 -好的

translation.en: [Suneeta] Shh, shh.
translation.zh: 别说话

translation.en: …getting a pet.
translation.zh: …养宠物

translation.en: [All] Surpri…
translation.zh: 没想到吧？

translation.en: Oh, it's you guys.
translation.zh: 原来是你们

translation.en: Namaste. What's the occasion? What are we celebrating?
translation.zh: 鞠躬 今天是什么大日子？ 要庆祝什么？

translation.en: -I'm Nick. -We're waiting for…
translation.zh: -我是尼克 -我们在等…

translation.en: -Oh, I see them coming! Stand over here. -Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: -我看到他们走过来了 赶紧站好 -好的

translation.en: -[Nick] Wait, what's going on? -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 等等 怎么回事？

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [all] Surprise!
translation.zh: 没想到吧？

translation.en: Look at their faces!
translation.zh: 瞧瞧他们的表情！

translation.en: Mom? Dad?
translation.zh: 妈妈、爸爸？

translation.en: I had no idea that Ravi's parents were joining us for lunch. Hello.
translation.zh: 我不知道拉维的父母 也会过来一起吃午饭 你们好

translation.en: Oh, your future in-laws don't need a formal invite.
translation.zh: 他们是你的未来公婆 没必要发出正式邀请

translation.en: Sorry, my what?
translation.zh: 是我的什么？

translation.en: Your mom is a bit overexcited.
translation.zh: 你妈有点太激动了

translation.en: [Suneeta] For your news, huh?
translation.zh: 你有大好消息要宣布 对吧？

translation.en: We wanted to throw a party, but this will do for now.
translation.zh: 我们本来打算办一场聚会的 但目前这样就足够了

translation.en: Okay. So tell us your big news!
translation.zh: 好了 马上宣布你的大好消息吧

translation.en: Oh my God. No, Mom. That's not what this is.
translation.zh: 天啊 妈妈 你误会了

translation.en: You're not getting engaged?
translation.zh: 难道你们不打算订婚吗？

translation.en: What? No. Dad, why would you think that?
translation.zh: 什么？没打算 老爸 你怎么会这么想呢？

translation.en: You and Asha seem so happy, we thought--
translation.zh: 你和艾莎在一起这么开心 我们以为…

translation.en: And then maybe my mom got a crazy idea?
translation.zh: 所以我妈就想多了？

translation.en: Suneeta, I told you not to let the bull hit you.
translation.zh: 苏妮塔 我都跟你说了 别与同一个地域的公牛为敌

translation.en: Boy, is that true, Mr. M.
translation.zh: 天啊 伯父 真有这句谚语吗？

translation.en: Always with the sayings, Vijay!
translation.zh: 维杰 老说同样的谚语不烦吗？

translation.en: Okay, then, so what is this big news?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你的大好消息是什么？

translation.en: Singapore, Ma! I got the funding for the loan initiative.
translation.zh: 我争取到新加坡的贷款资金了！

translation.en: -Oh my God! Congrats! -Hey!
translation.zh: 天啊 恭喜你！

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Is that a promotion?
translation.zh: 你升职了？

translation.en: Yes, actually. And a raise.
translation.zh: 没错 还加薪了

translation.en: -[scoffs] -More travel?
translation.zh: 以后会更常出远门吗？

translation.en: You could say that. The position is in the company headquarters in London, so…
translation.zh: 可以这么说 这个职位是在伦敦总部 所以…

translation.en: London, London?
translation.zh: 那个伦敦？

translation.en: Oh no. London, England, babe.
translation.zh: 不是 亲爱的 是英国首都伦敦

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. I don't accept this. No.
translation.zh: 不行 我不同意

translation.en: When were you gonna tell me?
translation.zh: 你本来打算什么时候告诉我的？

translation.en: Uh, right now. That's literally what this is.
translation.zh: 就是现在 这就是我要告诉你的大好消息

translation.en: Wow, London. That's, um…
translation.zh: 天啊 伦敦 这是…

translation.en: A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
translation.zh: 千载难逢的大好机会

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.zh: 谢了 老爸

translation.en: But look. If you're going to go so far at least get engaged first.
translation.zh: 听好 既然你要去这么远的地方 起码先订婚吧

translation.en: -Mom! -[Dinesh] I agree.
translation.zh: -妈妈！ -我同意

translation.en: I could check their horoscopes next week.
translation.zh: 我下星期就找人给你们看生辰八字

translation.en: No horoscope, none of this nonsense.
translation.zh: 别看生辰八字了 别信这些有的没的

translation.en: I agree. They care for each other. That's all that matters.
translation.zh: 我同意 最重要的是他们相亲相爱

translation.en: Yeah. And Ravi, we know you are a kind, decent, honest boy. Hmm?
translation.zh: 拉维 我们都知道 你是个善良诚实的好孩子 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, Auntie, it's nice that you say that, but I… I need to tell you something.
translation.zh: 伯母 很高兴听你这么说 有件事我一定要告诉你

translation.en: -Like, all of you. -[coughs]
translation.zh: 要告诉你们所有人

translation.en: Ravi. [chokes]
translation.zh: 拉维

translation.en: -Dad? -Dinesh?
translation.zh: -老爸？ -迪内什？

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Get some water.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？ -去倒杯水来

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Ravi, don't say anything. It's your last chance to be happy!
translation.zh: 拉维 什么都别说 这是你最后一次获得幸福的机会

translation.en: -Try to relax. -Quickly, quickly!
translation.zh: -放松 -快点

translation.en: I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我没事了

translation.en: Guys, he's fine. He panicked.
translation.zh: 各位 他没事 他只是太激动了

translation.en: Relax, Dinesh. They'll get married in their own time.
translation.zh: 迪内什 别激动 他们会选在合适的时候结婚

translation.en: -Dad, stop it. -Whiskey.
translation.zh: -老爸 别再说了 -我要威士忌

translation.en: Okay. Uncle, that's not the reason he panicked.
translation.zh: 伯父 这不是他激动的原因

translation.en: He panicked 'cause I was gonna tell you that my biodata, it's all lies.
translation.zh: 他激动是因为我刚才想跟你们说 我的个人资料都是假的

translation.en: But who cares? So is mine. Everyone's is.
translation.zh: 谁在乎呢？我的也是假的 每个人的资料都是假的

translation.en: Yeah, but Asha, mine is, like--
translation.zh: 没错 但我的…

translation.en: Yeah, but you did go to MIT. You do run your own company.
translation.zh: 你的确读过麻省理工学院 你确实自己开公司

translation.en: Okay, come on, Dad. Yeah, I went to MIT. Okay.
translation.zh: 够了 老爸 我确实读过麻省理工学院

translation.en: I was 16 years old. I didn't know what I was doing.
translation.zh: 当年我才16岁 不知道自己在做什么

translation.en: So I dropped out, by the way.
translation.zh: 于是我就退学了

translation.en: That must've been very difficult. When did you go back?
translation.zh: 你肯定很辛苦 那你什么时候回去接着读的？

translation.en: I didn't go back, Uncle.
translation.zh: 我没回去 伯父

translation.en: I couldn't. I just…
translation.zh: 我回不去了 我只是…

translation.en: I needed time to figure out what I wanted, without all the pressure.
translation.zh: 我需要时间想清楚自己想做什么 那段时间不能有任何压力

translation.en: And that time, it…
translation.zh: 那段时间…

translation.en: It saved my life.
translation.zh: 我的人生得救了

translation.en: So, yeah, I didn't finish college.
translation.zh: 总之我没大学毕业

translation.en: But I do have a company.
translation.zh: 但我确实有家公司

translation.en: It's just not a start-up. I'm a DJ.
translation.zh: 但不是什么初创企业 我是个DJ

translation.en: -[Nick scoffs] -[in Hindi] Hai raam.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [Vijay in English] It's okay.
translation.zh: 不要紧的

translation.en: Why didn't you just tell me?
translation.zh: 你怎么不直接告诉我呢？

translation.en: Asha, I tried to.
translation.zh: 艾莎 我试过告诉你的

translation.en: He should've come clean way sooner, but it's not a big deal.
translation.zh: 他应该早点跟你说清楚的 但也不算什么大事

translation.en: -When we found out, it-- -You and Nick knew about this?
translation.zh: -我和尼克得知… -你和尼克早就知道了？

translation.en: My buddy Joby told me, yeah.
translation.zh: 我的好兄弟乔比跟我说的

translation.en: You didn't think it was important to tell me?
translation.zh: 你们却认为没必要告诉我？

translation.en: Because we like him.
translation.zh: 因为我们都喜欢他啊

translation.en: Right?
translation.zh: 对吧？

translation.en: Oh yeah, no, we like him. Oh yeah, a lot.
translation.zh: 没错 我们都喜欢他 很喜欢他

translation.en: Wait a minute. Ravi, you had 15 years to make it right?
translation.zh: 等等 拉维 你明明有15年的时间调整人生方向

translation.en: Go back to school, get a job, but…
translation.zh: 回去上大学、找份工作 可是…

translation.en: [scoffs] You become a DJ?
translation.zh: 你却跑去当DJ？

translation.en: Ravi, can this lifestyle support a family?
translation.zh: 拉维 这种生活能够养家糊口吗？

translation.en: Dad, don't ask him that. We're not getting engaged.
translation.zh: 老爸 别问他这种问题 我们又没打算订婚

translation.en: Yeah, Uncle, I can.
translation.zh: 我有养家糊口的能力

translation.en: [Asha] And why are you even responding?
translation.zh: 为什么你要回应？

translation.en: I don't need anyone to support me. Why is this always about supporting me?
translation.zh: 我不需要任何人养 为什么偏要找个人养我呢？

translation.en: Even if I wanted a family, I could do it on my own.
translation.zh: 就算我想组织家庭 凭我一己之力也做得到

translation.en: All I would really like is some honesty.
translation.zh: 我要的只是诚意

translation.en: But Asha, wasn't it your idea to pretend to be a couple in the first place?
translation.zh: 艾莎 假扮情侣不是你出的主意吗？

translation.en: -[mothers] What? -Oh my God.
translation.zh: -什么？ -天啊

translation.en: You lied to us, Asha?
translation.zh: 你竟然欺骗我们？

translation.en: How could you do this?
translation.zh: 你怎么可以做出这种事？

translation.en: Because of this!
translation.zh: 因为你们！

translation.en: Because you people drive us insane with your pressure. This is what happens!
translation.zh: 因为你们向我们施压 把我们都搞疯了 这就是事实！

translation.en: We are dating now, though.
translation.zh: 但现在我们在认真交往中

translation.en: What's the point of that? You're a DJ. How will you pay for your kids' college?
translation.zh: 重要吗？你是个DJ 你付得起孩子的大学学费吗？

translation.en: -Mom… -Anyone smell the…
translation.zh: -妈妈！ -有人闻到…

translation.en: 'Cause it smells like burning, so…
translation.zh: 好像是烧焦的味道

translation.en: I told you! No one wants to marry a bum like you. Now do you see?
translation.zh: 都说没人想跟你这种废物结婚了 看到了吧？

translation.en: Don't call my son a bum!
translation.zh: 不准你叫我儿子废物！

translation.en: You encouraged this!
translation.zh: 是你鼓励他的

translation.en: Okay, Dad, stop.
translation.zh: 老爸 够了

translation.en: Let me ask you. Who do you think paid for all the catering orders these last months?
translation.zh: 过去几个月以来 是谁跟你订餐的？

translation.en: -What? -Food banks, homeless shelters, the teams.
translation.zh: -什么？ -食物银行、收容中心、棒球队

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Red Star Standard, Dad. Ring a bell?
translation.zh: -你说什么呢？ -你对红星拉萨基金会有印象吗？

translation.en: [Dinesh] What about it?
translation.zh: 基金会怎么了？

translation.en: Those are my initials, Dad. That's me, I'm Red Star Standard.
translation.zh: 我的名字都在上面了 我就是红星拉萨基金会的经营者

translation.en: Red Star Standard?
translation.zh: 红星拉萨基金会？

translation.en: That's you?
translation.zh: 原来是你？

translation.en: Yeah. It's this charitable fund I just…
translation.zh: 是我刚创立的慈善基金会…

translation.en: [whispers] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -Asha… -[smoke detector beeping]
translation.zh: 艾莎

translation.en: [breathes heavily] No one panic. The aloo gobi's on fire.
translation.zh: 别紧张 香辣土豆花椰菜烧焦了

translation.en: [Suneeta] What? Aloo gobi?
translation.zh: 什么？香辣土豆花椰菜烧焦了？

translation.en: -Asha, wait. -[Suneeta] Oh my God! [Asha] Did it ever occur to you to ask?
translation.zh: -艾莎 别跑 -你想过先问我吗？

translation.en: Why are you so upset?
translation.zh: 有必要这么生气吗？

translation.en: Oh. [scoffs] How many more surprises do you have for me?
translation.zh: 天啊 你还要给我多少惊喜？

translation.en: I thought this would make you happy.
translation.zh: 我以为这么做能让你开心

translation.en: "You have to own what you want and trust your inner voice?" What the hell?
translation.zh: 什么“接纳自己想要什么 倾听内心的声音”都是胡扯吧？

translation.en: I meant it.
translation.zh: 我是说真的

translation.en: But you don't think I can do my job on my own.
translation.zh: 但你显然认为我没有实力

translation.en: Asha, you convinced me it was a good investment--
translation.zh: 艾莎 是你说服了我相信 那是一项有意义的投资项目

translation.en: I wasn't trying to convince you. I needed to do this by myself.
translation.zh: 我没有要说服你的意思 我要靠自己做到

translation.en: I just wanted to help.
translation.zh: 我只是想帮你一把

translation.en: Help?
translation.zh: 帮我一把？

translation.en: The way you helped your dad? Don't you see that it's so patronizing?
translation.zh: 就像你帮你爸一把那样吗？ 你真以为自己高人一等吗？

translation.en: How do you even have so much money?
translation.zh: 你哪来的这么多钱？ 你去抢劫银行吗？

translation.en: Rob a bank? Sell endangered species off the back of a van.
translation.zh: 你哪来的这么多钱？ 你去抢劫银行吗？ 还是贩卖濒危物种？

translation.en: No, it's because of Facebook.
translation.zh: 不是 是脸书赚来的钱

translation.en: -So you did work at a start-up. -Not exactly.
translation.zh: 你确实曾在初创企业公司上班

translation.en: I DJ'd a couple parties for them back in the day and they couldn't pay.
translation.zh: 也不能这么说 我在他们好几场派对上演出过 当年他们付不起我的酬劳 于是给了我股份

translation.en: Gave me stock instead.
translation.zh: 当年他们付不起我的酬劳 于是给了我股份

translation.en: You made a million bucks DJing some nerd parties?
translation.zh: 在某个宅男办的派对上打碟 就能赚进一百万？

translation.en: A lot more, actually. Look, it's no big deal.
translation.zh: 其实更多 你听我说 那不是什么大事

translation.en: It is a big deal. I am not some cause.
translation.zh: 是大事 我不是你的资助对象

translation.en: I know that, Asha. I know that.
translation.zh: 我知道 艾莎

translation.en: At least Krish was honest about the fact that he didn't believe in me.
translation.zh: 起码克里什会当着我的面说 他不相信我有实力

translation.en: -You did it behind my back. -Seriously?
translation.zh: -你则在悄悄瞧不起我 -你真的这么想吗？

translation.en: Let me ask. You ever been honest about a single relationship?
translation.zh: 艾莎 我问你 你有没有对你的感情诚实过？

translation.en: -Don't turn this around. -You wanted to role-play.
translation.zh: -别反过来说我 -是你建议我们假扮情侣的

translation.en: Yeah, and you broke character.
translation.zh: 对啊 是你出戏了

translation.en: There is a big difference between telling a white lie and being completely untruthful.
translation.zh: 说善意的谎言和口是心非 完全是两回事

translation.en: Who even are you?
translation.zh: 你到底是怎么样的人？

translation.en: Asha, I'm the guy who went to 14 weddings with you.
translation.zh: 艾莎 我是那个跟你一起去过 14场婚礼的男人

translation.en: Not because I had to. Not because my parents forced me to.
translation.zh: 我去不是因为义务 不是因为我父母逼我去

translation.en: I went because I genuinely wanted to.
translation.zh: 而是因为我真心想去

translation.en: That's the only thing I was untruthful about.
translation.zh: 这是我唯一口是心非的事

translation.en: That I didn't have to pretend to be in love with you. Which is what I am, by the way.
translation.zh: 真相是我没必要假装跟你交往 因为我已经爱上你了

translation.en: I'm in love with you.
translation.zh: 我爱上你了

translation.en: I opened my heart to you, Ravi.
translation.zh: 拉维 我对你敞开心扉

translation.en: Do you know what that took?
translation.zh: 你知道有多难吗？

translation.en: And for the record,
translation.zh: 顺便说一下

translation.en: I don't care about MIT.
translation.zh: 我甚至不在乎 你是不是麻省理工学院的毕业生

translation.en: I trusted you, and you let me down.
translation.zh: 是你辜负了我对你的信任

translation.en: Hey, Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: I can't believe it, beta. You spent thousands on orders through Red Star.
translation.zh: 你以红星拉萨基金会的名义 在我们餐厅里花了好几千块

translation.en: He wouldn't let me help you otherwise, so…
translation.zh: 那是因为老爸不肯接受我的资助

translation.en: You were always different, even as a child.
translation.zh: 你从小就跟别人不一样

translation.en: And I worried for you.
translation.zh: 这也是我担心你的原因

translation.en: Mom, what was the point in lying?
translation.zh: 妈妈 何必骗人呢？

translation.en: Asha and her parents want nothing to do with me now.
translation.zh: 艾莎和他父母都跟我断绝来往了

translation.en: We were only trying to help.
translation.zh: 我们只想帮你一把

translation.en: Do not blame your mom. You met Asha because of that biodata.
translation.zh: 别怪你妈 你和艾莎 还不是因为那份个人资料认识的？

translation.en: Can't you see?
translation.zh: 你还不明白吗？

translation.en: You're our son. We would lie, die, whatever for your happiness.
translation.zh: 你是我们的儿子 为了你的幸福 我们不惜撒谎 要我们死也无妨

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, but I was happy.
translation.zh: 可是我并不没有不幸福啊

translation.en: Then you should've kept your mouth shut.
translation.zh: 那你当时就应该闭嘴

translation.en: Talk to her.
translation.zh: 去找她谈谈吧

translation.en: -She won't take my calls. -Then go to her.
translation.zh: -她不接我的电话 -那就去找她啊

translation.en: [sighs] It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 那也不重要了

translation.en: I came to tell you I'm going back to work.
translation.zh: 我来是想跟你们说 我要回去工作了

translation.en: Yoshi lined up a bunch of gigs, and I just…
translation.zh: 阿良给我排了很多演出 所以…

translation.en: -I think it's time. -Ravi, no.
translation.zh: -我该回去工作了 -拉维 别去

translation.en: Mom, I am done lying. I'm done pretending to be someone I'm not.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我不想再骗人了 不想再伪装自己了

translation.en: Again, you're running away the minute things get hard. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 事情不尽人意时 你就想逃避吗？

translation.en: Okay. Here's the thing, Dad.
translation.zh: 老爸 你听我说

translation.en: I am not running away.
translation.zh: 我并没有逃避

translation.en: Okay? This is my job. This is who I am.
translation.zh: 好吗？这是我的工作 这就是我

translation.en: I just wish you could see that. I wish that was enough, but clearly not…
translation.zh: 我真希望你会了解我 我希望你觉得我够好了 可是你显然…

translation.en: Ravi, it's not that. We want you--
translation.zh: 拉维 你误会了 我们只是希望你…

translation.en: We want the son we lost when he dropped out of MIT and disappeared.
translation.zh: 我们希望当年那个 退学后失踪的儿子能够回到我们身边

translation.en: -We want those years back. -Yeah, but those years are gone, Dad!
translation.zh: -我们想要找回那些年 -老爸 那些年都过去了！

translation.en: Those years are gone!
translation.zh: 那些年都过去了！

translation.en: But the son you do have is standing right in front of you. I am right here.
translation.zh: 但你的儿子就站在你的眼前 我就在这里

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I recommend a flat in Shoreditch.
translation.zh: 我推荐你一个位于肖迪奇的公寓单位

translation.en: It's murderously expensive, but you're getting a raise.
translation.zh: 房租超贵的 但你也快加薪了

translation.en: They called again to see if you'd signed.
translation.zh: 高层又打来了 他们想知道你签了没有

translation.en: Ash, he's an international DJ. You'll see him again.
translation.zh: 艾莎 他可是国际级DJ 你们还是会再见面的

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 不太可能

translation.en: Look. I'm sorry. I'm confused.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我想不通

translation.en: This guy that you pretended to date and thought was broke,
translation.zh: 你起初只是假装跟这个穷光蛋交往

translation.en: you actually fell in love with.
translation.zh: 结果你们真的恋爱了

translation.en: Okay. And, it turns out, oh, he's crazy rich.
translation.zh: 后来你发现他是超级富豪

translation.en: Not to mention, he helped you get promoted over your boss.
translation.zh: 他还帮你比你的上司先一步升职了

translation.en: He believes in you.
translation.zh: 说明他相信你的实力

translation.en: And this is the guy you never wanna see again.
translation.zh: 结果你却决定跟他断绝来往

translation.en: You need to swallow your pride you need to sign that contract,
translation.zh: 麻烦你放下尊严 签下那份合同

translation.en: and then you need to apologize to that boy. It is that simple.
translation.zh: 然后去跟那个家伙道歉 就这么简单

translation.en: -It's not-- -I don't wanna hear it!
translation.zh: -不是你想的… -我不想听

translation.en: You know what's not simple?
translation.zh: 你知道复杂的是什么吗？

translation.en: Seeing you go.
translation.zh: 送你离开的心情很复杂

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you.
translation.zh: 我会想念你的

translation.en: We're gonna miss you.
translation.zh: 我们都会想念你的

translation.en: I'm gonna hate your phony British accent you're obviously gonna come home with.
translation.zh: 等你以后回来后 我一定会恨死你一口造作的英国腔

translation.en: But if you let opportunities like this pass you by…
translation.zh: 可是如果你错过这个大好机会

translation.en: -I'm gonna have to kill you. -[Asha chuckles]
translation.zh: 我一定会杀了你

translation.en: I know people in this town who can make that happen.
translation.zh: -我认识几个杀手 -知道了

translation.en: -Okay. -If it's really over, why not just go? What's holding you back?
translation.zh: 既然你们都分手了 何必迟疑呢？ 是什么让你踌躇不前？

translation.en: I guess my family, my parents, my sister. I've never left them like this before.
translation.zh: 可能是舍不得我的父母和妹妹吧 我从来没离开他们这么远

translation.en: We spend so much energy trying to get away from our parents.
translation.zh: 我们花了这么大的力气 摆脱父母的羁绊

translation.en: And when we finally get the chance…
translation.zh: 如今终于有机会摆脱他们了

translation.en: It was hard for me to leave Jamaica for London.
translation.zh: 当初离开牙买加去伦敦时 我也是很痛苦

translation.en: I didn't want to abandon my parents. In spite of our differences.
translation.zh: 我并不想抛下父母 即使我们之间的想法相差很大

translation.en: And how did you?
translation.zh: 那你是怎么做到的？

translation.en: I realized my life is where I take it.
translation.zh: 我领悟到 我在哪里 我的人生就在哪里

translation.en: My parents will always be there for me.
translation.zh: 我的父母永远都不会离我而去

translation.en: But opportunities like these don't come along every day.
translation.zh: 但这种机会不是天天都有

translation.en: So this is where you're saving the world.
translation.zh: 原来这就是你拯救世界的地方

translation.en: -Dad? -[exhales] We were just leaving.
translation.zh: -老爸？ -我们正打算出去

translation.en: Mr. Maurya.
translation.zh: 莫亚先生

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来干什么？

translation.en: You want to go for a walk?
translation.zh: 要不要出去走走？

translation.en: Beta, when I was a young economist, it was a different time.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我还是个年轻的经济学家时 那是一个截然不同的年代

translation.en: White men half as smart as me would get promoted above me.
translation.zh: 只有白人男子有机会升职 即使他们的聪明只有我的一半

translation.en: I'd get stuck doing their job for them.
translation.zh: 我永远只有替他们干活的份

translation.en: You know what my boss said? He said, "Indians? They're smart, sure,
translation.zh: 你知道我的上司说什么吗？ 他说：“印度人确实很聪明

translation.en: but they're numbers guys. They'll never be leaders."
translation.zh: 但他们只懂数字 永远不是当领导的料”

translation.en: I know. Makes me so mad. I'm sorry you had to go through that, Dad.
translation.zh: 我知道 我知道后也很生气 真替你感到难过

translation.en: Which is why I was so worried that you were being too idealistic.
translation.zh: 我当初担心你 是因为你想得太完美了

translation.en: I didn't want you to face the same disappointment I had.
translation.zh: 我不希望你跟我一样失落

translation.en: But, um, look at you.
translation.zh: 可是 瞧瞧你

translation.en: You did it.
translation.zh: 你做到了

translation.en: Bigger numbers than I ever dreamt of.
translation.zh: 赚到的钱比我想象中还要多

translation.en: And you know what makes me the most proud?
translation.zh: 你知道我最感到自豪的是什么吗？

translation.en: That you did it on your own terms.
translation.zh: 你是以自己的方式做到的

translation.en: Jah, beti. Go to London. You deserve it.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 去伦敦吧 这是你应得的

translation.en: -[sighs] -Go have the experience of a lifetime.
translation.zh: 别错过这个千载难逢的体验

translation.en: For me.
translation.zh: 就当是为了我

translation.en: I'm sorry that I lied to you.
translation.zh: 对不起 我之前骗了你

translation.en: I'm sorry we drove you crazy.
translation.zh: 对不起 是我们把你逼疯了

translation.en: -I blame it on your mother. -[Asha giggles]
translation.zh: 我怪你妈

translation.en: I think I have time for some ice cream.
translation.zh: 我们应该有点时间去吃冰淇淋

translation.en: What kind of job is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么工作？

translation.en: Offo, where is your sister?
translation.zh: 天啊 你妹妹呢？

translation.en: Getting her makeup done. Relax.
translation.zh: 还在化妆 放松点

translation.en: Hai Bhagwan. Why is she only wearing one necklace?
translation.zh: 天啊 她今天怎么只戴一条项链？

translation.en: 'Cause she's not Mr. T, Ma.
translation.zh: 因为她不是T先生

translation.en: Well, she's late now. Call and see what time they left their home.
translation.zh: 她迟到了 打去问他们几点从他们家里出发

translation.en: Their home? What do you mean "their home"?
translation.zh: 他们家？怎么说？

translation.en: You think I was born yesterday. I know about the boyfriends.
translation.zh: 你以为我是小孩吗？ 我知道你以前交过好几个男朋友

translation.en: The sneaking around at night.
translation.zh: 我知道你们晚上偷溜出去

translation.en: And the fact that Nick and Priya live together.
translation.zh: 也知道尼克和普莉雅同居

translation.en: And yet you didn't say anything. That is very unlike you.
translation.zh: 但你却不发一言 这很不像你的作风

translation.en: I wanted her to tell me. I wanted my daughters to tell me everything.
translation.zh: 因为我要她亲口告诉我 我要我的女儿对我坦承一切

translation.en: Well, you know, Ma, that we've always wanted to.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我们一直都很想跟你说实话

translation.en: We just didn't know how.
translation.zh: 只是不知道怎么开口

translation.en: We never really speak about that stuff in our family.
translation.zh: 我们家也很少聊感情的事

translation.en: You never really even told me about your life before I was born.
translation.zh: 你也没跟我们说过我出生前 你过着怎么样的人生

translation.en: What is there to tell? I drove my parents crazy, just like you.
translation.zh: 有什么好说的？ 我把父母逼疯了 就跟你一样啊

translation.en: I find that very hard to believe.
translation.zh: 真是难以置信

translation.en: -I also know you found that photo. -Of you and that boy?
translation.zh: 我也知道你们发现了那张照片 你是指你和那个男生的合影？

translation.en: Parag and I were neighbors. Our fathers were old friends.
translation.zh: 我和帕拉格以前是邻居 我们俩的父亲是老朋友

translation.en: When Parag would come for tea with his father,
translation.zh: 帕拉格跟随他爸到我们家喝茶时

translation.en: we would sit in the garden and talk for hours.
translation.zh: 我们俩就会坐在花园里聊好几个小时

translation.en: Of course, we fell in love.
translation.zh: 所以很自然地就相爱了

translation.en: When it came time to arrange my marriage, I told my parents about him,
translation.zh: 直到我适合相亲的年龄 我跟父母说了我们交往的事

translation.en: but they forbade it.
translation.zh: 他们极力反对

translation.en: He was from a different caste, they said.
translation.zh: 他们说他来自不同的种姓

translation.en: My father never spoke to Parag's family again.
translation.zh: 事后我爸就跟帕拉格家断绝来往了

translation.en: My parents arranged a shaadi for me to your father and my fate was sealed.
translation.zh: 后来我父母把我许配给你爸 我的命运就这么被绑定了

translation.en: Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: That must have been so heartbreaking.
translation.zh: 你当时肯定很难过了

translation.en: It was.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [chuckles] At first, I pretended to love your dad.
translation.zh: 起初 我假装爱你爸

translation.en: But eventually, I didn't need to pretend anymore.
translation.zh: 可是到了后来 我再也不用装了

translation.en: And now I have you girls and this beautiful life.
translation.zh: 如今我有了你们两个女儿 人生总算圆满了

translation.en: Do you ever think about him?
translation.zh: 你会想起他吗？

translation.en: Oh yeah, from time to time.
translation.zh: 会啊 偶尔会

translation.en: I told myself, if I ever had daughters, I would let them choose their fate, their happiness.
translation.zh: 所以我告诉自己 如果有女儿 我会让她们选择自己的命运

translation.en: Yeah, as long as we have five MBAs, choose a nice guy, and make round rotis.
translation.zh: 对啊 只要我们获得 五个工商管理硕士学位 挑个好男人、懂得做印度煎饼

translation.en: -This looks good. You should wear this. -This isn't Game of Thrones.
translation.zh: -这条项链很好看 戴上吧 -这不是在演《权力的游戏》

translation.en: Listen to you, Miss Taco Bell. When have you even made one roti?
translation.zh: 你还敢说 塔可钟小姐？ 你什么时候做过印度煎饼了？

translation.en: -I made, like, a quarter once. -Yeah, once.
translation.zh: -有一次做过一小块 -是啊 就那么一次

translation.en: Oh, beta. I hate to see you go to London.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 妈妈舍不得你去伦敦

translation.en: But that is your fate.
translation.zh: 但那是你的命运

translation.en: And darling, I know Ravi's not perfect, but I feel he's your happiness.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我也知道拉维并不完美 但我觉得他就是你的幸福

translation.en: I see the way he looks at you.
translation.zh: 我看到他看你的眼神

translation.en: It's exactly the same way your father's looked at me since the day we met.
translation.zh: 就跟你爸当年第一次看我的眼神一样

translation.en: -Why are you sitting around? Priya's gone! -What?
translation.zh: 你们怎么还坐着闲聊？普莉雅失踪了 -什么？ -她没去化妆 手机也关了

translation.en: She's didn't show up for makeup and her phone is off.
translation.zh: -什么？ -她没去化妆 手机也关了

translation.en: She was supposed to do that an hour ago.
translation.zh: 她早应该在一个小时前就开始化妆了

translation.en: Calm down. She's gotta be here somewhere. Let's split up.
translation.zh: 冷静点 她肯定就在附近 我们分头去找吧

translation.en: Should've had sons.
translation.zh: 真希望生的是儿子

translation.en: Vijay, call 911!
translation.zh: 维杰 快报警啊！

translation.en: -I go this way, you that way. -Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: -你去这边找 你到那边找 -好的

translation.en: -Priya? -[Vijay] Priya?
translation.zh: -普莉雅！ -普莉雅！

translation.en: -[women shriek] -Ah! Sorry, Aunties.
translation.zh: 对不起 各位阿姨

translation.en: Priya!
translation.zh: 普莉雅！

translation.en: -Pri! -Darling?
translation.zh: -普莉雅！ -亲爱的！

translation.en: -[occupant yells] -Sorry! How many bathrooms are there?
translation.zh: 对不起 这里到底有多少个洗手间？

translation.en: Priya? Priya, beta!
translation.zh: 普莉雅 亲爱的！

translation.en: Don't worry, everything's fine. Priya!
translation.zh: 别担心 一切安好！ 普莉雅！

translation.en: -Asha. -Nick?
translation.zh: -艾莎 -尼克？

translation.en: -I need help. -Have you seen Priya?
translation.zh: -你一定要帮我 -有没有见到普莉雅？

translation.en: -Priya? -Yes!
translation.zh: -普莉雅？没见过 -对啊

translation.en: -No. Wait, I need your… -[groans] Priya! Pri?
translation.zh: -等等 我要你帮我… -普莉雅！

translation.en: Pri?
translation.zh: 普莉雅！

translation.en: -Pri, is that you? -[Priya] No. [sobs]
translation.zh: -普莉雅 是你吗？ -不是

translation.en: -Want to talk about it? -[Priya] No!
translation.zh: -要聊聊吗？ -不要

translation.en: Uh, okay, I don't mean to rush you, but your guests have started to arrive.
translation.zh: 我不想催你 但宾客都开始进场了

translation.en: [Priya] I don't care!
translation.zh: 我不管！

translation.en: Come on, open up. It's only me.
translation.zh: 快开门 外面只有我

translation.en: [Priya] It's fricking open.
translation.zh: 门没锁

translation.en: -What is going on here? -[grunts]
translation.zh: 你搞什么？

translation.en: I didn't want the ice sculptures. I didn't…
translation.zh: 我不要那些冰雕 我不要…

translation.en: I didn't want the gold-leaf cake, and why can't he just wear a tuxedo?
translation.zh: 不要那个金箔蛋糕 为什么我的新郎不能穿燕尾服？

translation.en: Okay, Dr. Priya, time for a little chat.
translation.zh: 普莉雅医生 我们聊一下吧

translation.en: He won't even tell me what his big surprise is.
translation.zh: 他连准备了什么惊喜也不跟我说

translation.en: Then it wouldn't be a surprise, would it?
translation.zh: 跟你说了就不是惊喜了 不是吗？

translation.en: I don't think this is about cakes or ice sculptures or surprises.
translation.zh: 我认为不是蛋糕、冰雕和惊喜的问题

translation.en: -I think this is about you. -How is this possibly about me?
translation.zh: -是你的问题 -怎么会是我的问题呢？

translation.en: For some reason, I think this whole seven lifetimes thing has you kind of freaked out.
translation.zh: 我觉得这个七生七世的结合 让你感到惶恐不安

translation.en: It just got me thinking.
translation.zh: 我在想…

translation.en: Every generation in our family has done this for centuries.
translation.zh: 过去好几个世纪以来 我们家族世世代代都有办婚礼的习俗

translation.en: What if I'm the first one to screw it up?
translation.zh: 万一我是第一个搞砸婚礼的人呢？

translation.en: You don't have to worry. I already screwed it up.
translation.zh: 放心吧 我搞砸过一次了

translation.en: But I'm the first one to marry someone who isn't Indian.
translation.zh: 我是家族里第一个跟非印裔结婚的人

translation.en: Is that what this is about? 'Cause Nick is way more Indian than we are.
translation.zh: 是吗？尼克比我们更像印度人

translation.en: Are you seriously gonna say that to me? How's that supposed to make me feel…
translation.zh: 都这种时候了 你还对我说这种话？ 你说我会有什么感受？

translation.en: I know. Listen, listen, listen.
translation.zh: 我懂 你听我说

translation.en: -[sobs] -Nick is crazy about you.
translation.zh: 尼克很爱很爱你

translation.en: Okay? I mean, otherwise he wouldn't be dressed the way he is.
translation.zh: 知道吗？不然他也不会 把自己打扮成那个样子

translation.en: -How's he dressed? -Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: -他打扮成什么样子了？ -不重要

translation.en: What matters is that he loves you.
translation.zh: 重点是他爱你

translation.en: And Mom and Dad love him.
translation.zh: 爸爸妈妈也爱他

translation.en: Or at least, they will learn to.
translation.zh: 起码他们会学着喜欢上他

translation.en: The only question that remains is, do you?
translation.zh: 如今只剩一个问题 你爱他吗？

translation.en: But I'm scared.
translation.zh: 可是我很害怕

translation.en: We're all scared.
translation.zh: 我们都会害怕

translation.en: If you don't marry Nick today,
translation.zh: 如果你今天没嫁给尼克

translation.en: you're gonna regret it for the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 那你会遗憾终生

translation.en: Pri, you have a chance to live your life the way you want to.
translation.zh: 普莉雅 你有机会过上你要的人生

translation.en: So just tune out the noise.
translation.zh: 别理这个世界的噪音

translation.en: Listen to your heart.
translation.zh: 倾听内心的声音

translation.en: Let your love be greater than your fear.
translation.zh: 用爱战胜恐惧

translation.en: [chuckles] That's beautiful, Ash.
translation.zh: 说得太好了 艾莎

translation.en: -Did you come up with that yourself? -Yep.
translation.zh: -这句话是你自己想出来的吗？ -是的

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: It was someone a little bit smarter than me.
translation.zh: 是一个比我聪明的人想出来的

translation.en: We need to get you into makeup. Now.
translation.zh: 我得赶紧带你去化妆 走吧

translation.en: -Really? -Yes, really. You should see your face.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -真的 瞧瞧你的脸

translation.en: God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Priya! Thank God! Quickly, let's get you ready and dressed.
translation.zh: 普莉雅 谢天谢地 赶紧去梳妆打扮吧

translation.en: -Have you been drinking? -No.
translation.zh: -你喝了很多酒吗？ -没有

translation.en: Yes. Get her some coffee.
translation.zh: 是的 赶紧给她弄杯咖啡

translation.en: Wait, wait, no. Let's get you dressed.
translation.zh: 等等 你也赶紧梳妆打扮吧

translation.en: There's something I need to do first.
translation.zh: 有一件事我必须先去做好

translation.en: -Where you going? -Don't worry, I'll be back.
translation.zh: -你上哪儿去？ -别担心 我去去就回来

translation.en: Hai raam! I can smell the Pinot Grigio on you.
translation.zh: 天啊 我可以闻到 你身上的白葡萄酒味

translation.en: -I know. I was 12 years old. -Oh my God.
translation.zh: -我知道 那年我才12岁 -天啊

translation.en: And so, I'm alone with this person who's driving me crazy.
translation.zh: 在场只有我和这个人 他快把我逼疯了

translation.en: I had to walk home. Can you imagine that?
translation.zh: 我只好走路回家 很难想象吧？

translation.en: -And I decided to keep it. -Ravi?
translation.zh: -我决定把它留下来 -拉维！

translation.en: -Asha. What're you doing here? -I was an idiot. I owe you an apology.
translation.zh: -艾莎 你怎么来了？ -我是白痴 我欠你一个道歉

translation.en: Asha, you don't have to--
translation.zh: 你没必要…

translation.en: I never had a chance to thank you. For going along with my crazy scheme.
translation.zh: 我还没来得及感谢你 愿意配合我演出这出大戏

translation.en: For teaching me how to drop beats and turn tables.
translation.zh: 没来得及感谢你 教我怎么放音乐和掌控气氛

translation.en: For donating 50 years' worth of Indian takeout to my work.
translation.zh: 感谢你为了我的工作 捐了足够吃50年印度外卖的钱

translation.en: I know it came from your heart.
translation.zh: 我知道你是真心的

translation.en: Because everything you do comes from your heart.
translation.zh: 因为你所做的一切都是真心的

translation.en: [inhales] And I was wrong to say you didn't believe in me.
translation.zh: 我说你不相信我的实力 是我不对

translation.en: [whispers] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Ash…
translation.zh: 艾莎

translation.en: Um, Ravi, who is this?
translation.zh: 拉维 她是谁啊？

translation.en: [Asha] Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 不重要

translation.en: What matters is this is a great guy, you know?
translation.zh: 最重要的是 他是个好男人

translation.en: He's brilliant. He's kind. He's a true original.
translation.zh: 他很出色 而且心地善良 也忠于自己

translation.en: He might seem like a bit of a slacker at first.
translation.zh: 只是可能看起来有点懒散

translation.en: I thought so too.
translation.zh: 我起初也是这么想的

translation.en: And you should never play him at Bananagrams. Ever.
translation.zh: 还有绝对不要挑战他玩香蕉拼字游戏

translation.en: As you get to know him, he grows on you.
translation.zh: 认识他越久就越喜欢他

translation.en: And if you're not too blind,
translation.zh: 如果你没有太瞎

translation.en: you'll find he's the kind of guy you want cheering you on.
translation.zh: 你会意识到 他就是你要找的那个懂得鼓励你的人

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: 一直都是

translation.en: Ash.
translation.zh: 艾莎

translation.en: -Asha. -[woman] Go.
translation.zh: -艾莎 -去追啊

translation.en: -Go! -Asha!
translation.zh: -快追上去！ -艾莎！

translation.en: It's not what you think!
translation.zh: 你误会了！

translation.en: Asha. Asha, wait!
translation.zh: 艾莎 别走！

translation.en: -[Vijay] Everything's gonna be fine. -Why do you keep saying that?
translation.zh: -一切安好 -为什么你老说这句话？

translation.en: Why do you keep telling me to calm down. This is serious.
translation.zh: 为什么你一直要我冷静？ 这种时刻怎么冷静？

translation.en: People are listening.
translation.zh: 大家都在听

translation.en: -Why are we here? -Thank God you're here.
translation.zh: -我们站在台前干什么？ -好在你到了

translation.en: Great. Now we need the groom.
translation.zh: 很好 如今只差新郎

translation.en: Where's Nick?
translation.zh: 尼克呢？

translation.en: -You haven't seen him? -No. Why?
translation.zh: -你们还没见到他吗？ -没有 怎么了？

translation.en: This is a disaster!
translation.zh: 这简直是一场灾难！

translation.en: If this is his surprise, this is not funny.
translation.zh: 如果这就是他所谓的惊喜 一点也不好笑

translation.en: This white guy is taking Indian Standard Time to a new level.
translation.zh: 这个白人把印度人不准时的习惯 提升到新的高度

translation.en: [Priya] How could he just disappear?
translation.zh: 他怎么就这样突然消失了呢？

translation.en: -I did see him before and he-- -He what?
translation.zh: -我刚刚见过他 他… -他怎么了？

translation.en: He was asking for help.
translation.zh: 他向我求助

translation.en: -You didn't help him? -I was looking for you!
translation.zh: -你没帮他吗？ -我在找你啊

translation.en: -God, our daughters will never marry! -Ma. Come on.
translation.zh: -天啊 我们的女儿都嫁不出去了 -妈妈 别闹了

translation.en: Is that an elephant?
translation.zh: 那是一头大象吗？

translation.en: [in Hindi] Hai Bhagwan.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: [in English] Oh. My. God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [in Hindi] Welcome, Spice Girls!
translation.zh: 欢迎各位辣妹子！

translation.en: Priya.
translation.zh: 普莉雅

translation.en: You are a dead onion.
translation.zh: 你是个死洋葱

translation.en: With you, I'm a thin banana.
translation.zh: 跟你在一起 我就是一条瘦瘦的香蕉

translation.en: -[in English] Did I… I said… -No.
translation.zh: -我是不是说错话了？ -没有

translation.en: -No? -No.
translation.zh: -没有？ -没有

translation.en: My God, I'm so sorry I was so late.
translation.zh: 天啊 对不起 我迟到得太离谱了

translation.en: I know you didn't want a whole thing, and I did a whole thing.
translation.zh: 我知道你不想搞大场面 结果我偏偏搞了大场面

translation.en: It was perfect.
translation.zh: 你做得太好了

translation.en: I love you so much.
translation.zh: 我好爱好爱你

translation.en: [Asha] Come on, let's get you married!
translation.zh: 你们赶紧行礼吧！

translation.en: Congratulations, guys. Whoo!
translation.zh: 恭喜你们

translation.en: And congratulations to my mom and dad too, for staying out of their way.
translation.zh: 也恭喜我爸妈 很高兴他们在大多数情况下

translation.en: -Mostly. -Little bit.
translation.zh: -没有干涉这段感情 -偶尔会

translation.en: One thing that I have learned about love…
translation.zh: 对于爱情 我领悟到了一个道理

translation.en: is that it's a lot like moving to a new country.
translation.zh: 爱情就像搬到一个新的国家

translation.en: Trying to build something where nothing existed before.
translation.zh: 努力从零开始创造人生

translation.en: It's hanging on and letting go.
translation.zh: 有时要坚持 有时要放手

translation.en: It's messy, it's beautiful,
translation.zh: 令人无所适从 但处处是美景

translation.en: like any giant leap of faith.
translation.zh: 就像跨出信心的一大步

translation.en: So congratulations to the two of you for taking that leap.
translation.zh: 所以我要恭喜你们 跨出了这信心的一步

translation.en: May you take many more. I love you.
translation.zh: 希望你们以后继续跨步向前 我爱你们

translation.en: -Cheers to Nick and Priya! -Cheers!
translation.zh: 为尼克和普莉雅干杯！

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯！

translation.en: [Priya] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Aw! You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: [Asha] I love you guys.
translation.zh: 我爱你们

translation.en: [Priya] Thank you, Ash.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 艾莎

translation.en: You could get married too.
translation.zh: 你也可以嫁人了

translation.en: -[Priya] I love you. -Mom!
translation.zh: -我爱你 -妈妈！

translation.en: And thank you to everyone who celebrated with us today.
translation.zh: 感谢今天来跟我们一起庆祝 这个大喜之日的每一个人

translation.en: But we have a surprise for you.
translation.zh: 我们给大家准备了一个惊喜

translation.en: I am honored to invite
translation.zh: 我有幸邀请到了

translation.en: our own DJ Spellbound!
translation.zh: 我们家的DJ拼魔！

translation.en: That's Ravi!
translation.zh: 是拉维！

translation.en: Look, Asha, that's Ravi.
translation.zh: 艾莎 你看 是拉维！

translation.en: You have to say something to them.
translation.zh: 去吧 你一定要说点什么！

translation.en: Stop the music! Stop the music!
translation.zh: 关掉音乐！

translation.en: What in God's name is going on? Pinky, please sit down.
translation.zh: 到底怎么回事？红姨 坐下吧

translation.en: Suneeta, Vijay, it is my duty to tell you that this boy is a fraud.
translation.zh: 苏妮塔、维杰 我有义务告诉你们 这个男人是个骗子

translation.en: -Pinky, it's okay. -I tried to warn you.
translation.zh: -红姨 不要紧的 -我试过警告你们

translation.en: No, no, no. Pinky, enough.
translation.zh: 别说了 红姨 够了

translation.en: Enough.
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: You need to let this go.
translation.zh: 你要放下

translation.en: Maybe it's time we learn something from our kids and leave the shame behind.
translation.zh: 也许我们是时候向孩子们学习了 放下不堪回首的过去吧

translation.en: [auntie] Pinky, it's over. Come.
translation.zh: 红姨 结束了 来吧

translation.en: [chuckles] Sorry. She's a little drunk.
translation.zh: 不好意思 她有点醉了

translation.en: Um, if I may, uh…
translation.zh: 我想…

translation.en: Pinky Auntie's right.
translation.zh: 红姨说得对

translation.en: I haven't been honest about who I am for a very, very long time.
translation.zh: 我有很长一段时日没忠于自己

translation.en: It's okay, Ravi.
translation.zh: 拉维 不要紧的

translation.en: Thank you, Uncle, but I'm sorry, um…
translation.zh: 谢谢你 伯父 但我要道歉

translation.en: Not for me. For the people I've hurt.
translation.zh: 不是对自己道歉 而是对我伤害过的人道歉

translation.en: Especially you, Asha.
translation.zh: 尤其是你 艾莎

translation.en: And to you, Nick and Priya.
translation.zh: 还有你们 尼克和普莉雅

translation.en: I, uh, know a wedding isn't the place for this, but I, um…
translation.zh: 我知道在婚礼上 不适合说这番话 不过我…

translation.en: -Dad, just-- -Please.
translation.zh: -老爸 这… -给我吧

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Let me speak. Let me speak.
translation.zh: -你想干什么？ -让我说几句话

translation.en: Yes. Ravi did not graduate from MIT. He does not have a start-up.
translation.zh: 没错 拉维并没有 从麻省理工学院毕业 也不是初创企业的老板

translation.en: -Is there a point? What are you doing? -Yes.
translation.zh: -这是重点吗？你想干什么？ -是的

translation.en: The point is that it doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 重点是 这些都不重要

translation.en: I, we…
translation.zh: 我…我们…

translation.en: are very proud that you're our son.
translation.zh: 我们为有你这个儿子感到十分自豪

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 老爸

translation.en: [Dinesh] Okay, enough.
translation.zh: 好了 够了

translation.en: Asha, I'm sorry I wasn't more honest with you.
translation.zh: 艾莎 对不起 我没对你坦诚

translation.en: Reality is, I've never had truer feelings than when I was pretending to date you.
translation.zh: 事实上 跟你假扮情侣期间 我的感情都是最真实的

translation.en: I wasn't even really pretending.
translation.zh: 我根本就没在装

translation.en: Asha, you're gonna change the world.
translation.zh: 艾莎 你以后一定会改变世界的

translation.en: That beautiful mind and that big heart.
translation.zh: 因为你拥有美丽的心灵和宽大的胸怀

translation.en: I just hope there's room for me in it. Someday.
translation.zh: 我只希望总有一天 你会在心里给我留一个位置

translation.en: What about her?
translation.zh: 那她怎么办？

translation.en: Me?
translation.zh: 我？

translation.en: That's Pihu. Um, she's my cousin.
translation.zh: 她是碧胡 我的表姐

translation.en: [Ravi] Say hi, Pihu.
translation.zh: 碧胡 打个招呼吧

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 起来

translation.en: [Vijay whispers] Go.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: Whoo! Yay! [chuckles] Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: -[Nick] Yeah! -[Priya] Finally!
translation.zh: -太好了！ -终于在一起了！

translation.en: [Asha] My name is Asha Maurya.
translation.zh: 我叫艾莎·莫亚

translation.en: And I have a joyous appetite for life.
translation.zh: 我胃口很大 很能吃

translation.en: I am a natural in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 我是天生的厨艺高手

translation.en: And yearn to have a family to feed.
translation.zh: 我向往为家人做菜

translation.en: I save the world by day.
translation.zh: 白天 我拯救世界

translation.en: But live a quiet, traditional life by night.
translation.zh: 入夜后 我过着平凡安静的生活

translation.en: At heart, I'm just a simple girl whose hobbies include fine dining
translation.zh: 我内心里只是个平凡的女孩 爱好包括到高级餐厅用餐

translation.en: and relaxing at home.
translation.zh: 以及在家懒洋洋地放松

translation.en: Seeking my Indian Prince Charming with a freelance job and a heart of gold.
translation.zh: 我在寻找我的印度白马王子 他必须是自由工作者 还要热心慷慨

translation.en: I love weddings and dream of having a grand one of my own someday.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢出席婚礼了 我梦想将来办一场世纪婚礼

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 可能吧

translation.en: I think.
translation.zh: 我是这么想的
